collections_json.Tutorial.collections.step1: Look at these funny-looking eggs! Wonder what cute little things are snuggled up inside. Shall we merge them and see?
collections_json.Tutorial.collections.step2: Baby hydras! They're a bit...different. But we've got to be brave and merge them. Who knows what they might become!
collections_json.Tutorial.story_clhydra_2.step1: I wonder what little surprises from our new hydra friend are waiting for us inside. Let's open it!
collections_json.Tutorial.story_clstrawberry_3.step1: Let's pick some of these magic apples. Can't wait to see our little friends' faces light up with joy.
collections_json.Tutorial.story_clstrawberry_3.step2: Alright, it's feeding time at ZooVillage! Who's ready for a yummy treat?
collections_json.Tutorial.story_clpawchest_0.step1: Each critter we meet is an essential piece of ZooVillage. Let's discover who we're sharing this wonderful place with!
collections_json.Tutorial.story_clshop_0.step1: It's shopping time! Let's see who we can bring into our loving community today. Every creature counts in ZooVillage!

collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clhydra_2.step1: Well now, isn't this a sight for sore eyes! Even for an experienced dragon keeper like me, ZooVillage is truly a wonder.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clhydra_2.step2: It's humbling to think they've opened their home to us. Our past deeds must've really made an impression.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clhydra_2.step3: Indeed. Your efforts to protect and nurture various species haven't gone unnoticed. Your passion for creatures of all shapes and sizes has led you here.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clhydra_2.step4: So our good deeds caught their attention. But what's our main goal here?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clhydra_2.step5: These adorable creatures are in a bind. Their ecosystem is out of balance, and they need our help to put things right. There are so many of them that I alone couldn't handle it. So, who better to call than the best creature-caring team I know!
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clstrawberry_3.step1: Hey guys, anyone care for an apple? They look scrumptious!
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clstrawberry_3.step2: Hold on, these aren't just any apples. They're brimming with magic!
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clstrawberry_3.step3: Magic, you say? Do they grant wishes or turn frogs into princes?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clstrawberry_3.step4: Not exactly, but they do work wonders on the local creatures! They absolutely adore these apples, and, in their happiness, they even give us special rewards in return.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clstrawberry_3.step5: So we keep them happy, they keep us rewarded, and together we create a happy little corner in ZooVillage. I love it!
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clstrawberry_3.step6: Let's not forget, we're here not just for the rewards. We're here to nurture our little friends. And these magic apples? Just one of the many ways we show our love for them.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clpawchest_0.step1: Wow, would you look at that! That's not your average basket, is it?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clpawchest_0.step2: No, it isn't! It's a Beastie Basket, filled with different levels of our ZooVillage friends. Isn't it amazing how they all fit in?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clpawchest_0.step3: I'm excited to see what's creatures are inside. Remember, every stage is an important part of their growth. Let's treat each one with care!
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clshop_0.step1: Interesting, a marketplace in ZooVillage. Wonder what it's for...
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clshop_0.step2: Ah, yes, this place. It's more of a curiosities shop, if you ask me. They trade in coffers here.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clshop_0.step4: Sort of, except these chests have a different kind of treasure. They contain various stages of our village inhabitants.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.clshop_0.step5: Fascinating! So, we could introduce more diversity to our community this way.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_0.collections.step1: Observing this flower, it's a spectacle of delicate beauty, yet it seems to hold a formidable strength within.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_0.collections.step2: Indeed, it's more than a mere blossom; it's a symbol. Its unique characteristics inspire all dwellers of our lush village to persist and prosper, even amidst adversity.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_0.collections.step3: Could such a flower hold secrets or powers yet to be discovered?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_0.collections.step4: One might think! Nature often hides its most profound secrets in plain sight, waiting for curious minds to uncover them.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_0.collections.step5: Indeed, let’s honor its presence. It stands as a gentle reminder of the resilient bonds that intertwine through our flourishing village.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_1.collections.step1: What's the story behind this unique structure at the base of ZooVillage? It emanates a sense of wisdom and sanctuary. Is it of particular significance to the creatures here?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_1.collections.step2: Absolutely, it's not just a structure but a beacon where beings come to meditate and share experiences. It symbolizes the collective wisdom of this land, serving as a sanctuary of knowledge and tranquility.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_1.collections.step3: Intriguing, a repository of ancient knowledge and teachings, perhaps? Will there be an opportunity for exploration?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_1.collections.step4: Indeed, this structure is one of many wonders in ZooVillage. As we continue to explore its expansive territories, you'll discover that every nook and cranny holds a secret, every pathway leads to amazement. It's a realm that perpetually astonishes.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_2.collections.step1: The lushness of this place is truly enchanting! The melody of flowing water whispers of refreshment and vitality. Is there a tale behind these rejuvenating springs?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_2.collections.step2: Indeed, what you hear is not just any spring; it's the Eternal Spring! A symbol of life and renewal here, its magical waters are said to rejuvenate all who encounter them.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_2.collections.step3: Rejuvenation, you say? Could it perhaps hold secrets to vitality and youth?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_2.collections.step4: It may not grant eternal youth, but the Eternal Spring is a source of hope and perpetual growth in this place.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_2.collections.step5: Perpetual growth? Like an ever-flowing source of life and energy?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_2.collections.step6: Precisely, though its boundless flow ensures that our vibrant ecosystem continues to thrive. A true spectacle to witness.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_3.collections.step1: Behold the waterfall yonder, embraced by vibrant foliage. Known as the Green Waterfall, it stands as a symbol of harmony and tranquility in our lush village.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_3.collections.step2: A waterfall enveloped by such lively trees? It presents a flawless equilibrium between the elements of water and greenery. The serenity is palpable.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_3.collections.step3: Indeed, its lively surroundings serve as a reminder of the fragile balance among nature's various elements and our responsibility in preserving it.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_3.collections.step4: Does the tranquility of the waterfall attract many visitors seeking peace and reflection?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_3.collections.step5: Certainly, it's a place where many find solace and inspiration. For now, let’s immerse ourselves in the beauty and significance of the Green Waterfall.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_4.collections.step1: This structure captivates the gaze, doesn’t it? A grand dome, adorned with intricate designs, it whispers of stories yet to be unveiled.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_4.collections.step2: Indeed, it's the Dome Chamber, an astronomical observatory. The beings of ZooVillage utilize it to delve into the mysteries of stars and planets.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_4.collections.step3: An observatory, right here in ZooVillage? That introduces a scientific facet to this enchanting place.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_4.collections.step4: It stands as a symbol of the village's cosmic connection and the perpetual quest to unravel the enigmas of existence.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_5.collections.step1: This mystical sphere seems to pulsate with an enigmatic energy. Could this be the renowned Magic Portal of ZooVillage?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_5.collections.step2: Indeed, the Magic Portal serves as a conduit, linking our world to distant realms. It symbolizes boundless possibilities and the interconnectedness of all worlds.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_5.collections.step3: A gateway to different realms? Is it possible to discover advanced technologies through it?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_5.collections.step4: Maybe, but its primary purpose is to remind us of our interconnectedness with all life forms. However, a bit of exploration might reveal unexpected wonders!
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_5.collections.step5: As long as the exploration doesn’t lead to a world teeming with troublesome creatures, count me in!
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_6.collections.step1: Behold the splendid Frostwyrm! It's more than a magnificent statue; it represents the resilience and might of ZooVillage's inhabitants.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_6.collections.step2: I've never encountered such a sight. Its icy, crystalline eyes appear to vigilantly watch over us. Does it also symbolize protection?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_6.collections.step3: Indeed, it stands as a guardian of ZooVillage, signifying that even amidst the chilliest times, determination and unity fortify our strength.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_6.collections.step4: A frosty sentinel for a lively village. What a striking contrast!
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_7.collections.step1: What's that unique structure emerging from the jungle? It resembles a pyramid, yet it's overflowing with tropical flora.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_7.collections.step2: It's known as the Tropical Pyramid, a historical monument that honors the diversity of ZooVillage's ecosystems.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_7.collections.step3: A pyramid amidst a jungle? That's quite the spectacle! It's as if history and nature convened, and this was the splendid outcome.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_8.collections.step1: Is that a flower shop that's embraced the wild side? What's the story with all these blooms?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_8.collections.step2: Ah, that's the Floral Fountain. Each bloom symbolizes a different species found within our vibrant village.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_8.collections.step3: Do you suppose a dip in there would leave one smelling like a fresh bouquet?
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_8.collections.step4: The notion of anyone bathing amidst those tender petals is quite the whimsical thought!
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_8.collections.step5: Even those who appreciate a hearty adventure can find joy in a fragrant bouquet! But perhaps traditional baths have their own charm.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_9.collections.step1: What's that luminous object over there? It's ablaze with a fierce fire, yet it doesn’t seem to extinguish.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_9.collections.step2: Ah, that's the Fire Crystal. It's not merely a radiant gem; it symbolizes the passion and energy that fuels all beings in our vibrant village. Its flame epitomizes the vitality and life force of every creature here.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_9.collections.step3: A crystal with an eternal flame? Its power must emanate from a profound source.
collections_unitStories_json.UnitStory.cllandmark_9.collections.step4: Indeed, the Fire Crystal derives its might from the deep-seated connection among all inhabitants of our village. It perpetually reminds us of our collective essence and the boundless energy we generate together.

common_json.DeleteAccountWindow.title: Delete account
common_json.DeleteAccountWindow.text1: You are requesting to delete your account.%{newline}If you tap "Continue", all your account data will be deleted, including your:%{newline}1. Purchases.%{newline}2. Game progress.%{newline}3. Account info.
common_json.DeleteAccountWindow.text2: The deletion process takes %{days} days. After that, you won't be able to restore any of your account data.
common_json.DeleteAccountWindow.text3: If you return to the game before %{days} days expire, you'll be able to revert the process, restore your progress, and keep enjoying the game.
common_json.DeleteAccountConfirmationWindow.title: Delete account confirmation
common_json.DeleteAccountConfirmationWindow.text1: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
common_json.DeleteAccountConfirmationWindow.text2: If you tap "Delete", the app will close. The deletion process takes %{days} days. After that, you won't be able to restore any of your account data.
common_json.DeleteAccountConfirmationWindow.text3: If you return after %{days} days expire:%{newline}1. You won't be able to cancel the account deletion.%{newline}2. You'll lose all of your account data, including game progress and purchases.%{newline}3. You'll have to start the game from the beginning.
common_json.DeleteAccountInformationWindow.title: Your account is being deleted
common_json.DeleteAccountInformationWindow.time: Your account will be deleted within %{days} days.
common_json.DeleteAccountInformationWindow.text1: The account you used to log in is undergoing the deletion process. Cancel the deletion to save all of your account data.%{newline}To do that, simply press on the "Cancel" button to restore your progress and purchases.
common_json.DeleteAccountInformationWindow.text2: If you decide to proceed with deletion, kindly make sure that you don't have any active subscriptions related to the account. Billing for an auto-renewable subscription continues through your provider regardless of whether you delete your game account.
common_json.DeleteAccountInformationWindow.revoke.ap: You need to revoke permissions granted to the app via the device account settings.
common_json.DeleteAccountRestartWindow.title: Restart app
common_json.DeleteAccountRestartWindow.text1: Your account data was deleted. If you wish to start a new game kindly restart the app.

dragonia_json.TravelBookForce.dragonia: We’re about to embark on the most dangerous but most rewarding adventure so far. We can't do it without you!
dragonia_json.TravelBookForce.dragonia2: Dragonia is in danger! Hurry up to save it!
dragonia_json.TravelBookForce.dragonia3: Dragonia in distress! Be the one to save it!
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia.step1: Dragon eggs! These are exactly what we need. Let’s merge.
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia.step2: The blue dragon can help us access the tree of life. Let’s collect the keys.
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia.step3: Now we can use them to unlock other parts of Dragonia!
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia.step4: It looks like we can’t get away from the ents wherever we go. Time to chop!
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia.step5: I’m curious what’s hidden inside a dragon ent!
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia.step6: We need more keys to keep going. Let's get them!
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia2.step1: Dragon eggs! Luckily we already know what to do with them. Let’s merge.
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia2.step2: Let's cultivate some local delicacies and thank our friends for inviting us back!
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia2.step3: All this practice is paying off. It's time to harvest!
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia2.step4: I wonder why they call them dragon fruit... Bon appeti!
dragonia_json.Tutorial.dragonia2.step5: Now our friend is in a good mood to help us explore these vast lands!

dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2blacksmith_open.step1: We made it here, but our equipment needs some serious repair.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2blacksmith_open.step2: Agreed. Let's ask around and see if we can find a local craftsman.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2treasuremap_0.step1: The craftsman told me about a distant island that even the dragons fear. It's said to be full of treasures beyond our wildest dreams.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2treasuremap_0.step3: Indeed, it is. And he happens to have a map that leads to that island. But before he gives it to us, he wants something in return.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.treasureisland.step1: The map is now in our possession! However, the craftsman cautioned that it can only be used once. After determining the island's location, the map will vanish.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.treasureisland.step3: This serves as a safeguard to protect the island from treasure hunters. The fewer people who know about its whereabouts, the better.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.treasureisland.step4: This adventure is shaping up to be even more thrilling than we imagined!
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_open.step1: An incredible adventure awaits us. It's evident that we must assemble an expedition and prepare the construction site to build the aircraft.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_open.step2: It will demand considerable effort from us. There's still time to return to the comfort of our home...
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_open.step3: Despite the challenges, the potential rewards are worth the risk. Are you prepared to take one final glimpse at the map before it vanishes?
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_open.step4: Let's dive in and commence our preparations!
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_0.step1: Before we can even begin building the airship, we need to clear this space. The ruins are blocking the way.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_0.step2: You're right. It'll take some time to clear everything, but it needs to be done.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_0.step3: This is hard work, but it'll be worth it once we have the airship and can set off on our expedition.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_0.step4: We'll need to make sure we're thorough in our cleanup. We don't want any debris getting in the way of the airship's operation.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_1.step1: The construction site is all set up. Now, we just need to gather the supplies for the airship.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_1.step2: Absolutely. We should create a list of essential materials and start collecting them as soon as possible.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_1.step3: While we're at it, let's not forget to plan our expedition and research the island's potential challenges.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_1.step4: Great ideas. Let's divide the tasks and regroup once we've made progress.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_2.step1: We're making good progress, but we still have a lot of work to do. Before we can even think about taking off, we need to prepare the take-off location.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_2.step2: That's right. We need to make sure the ground is level and stable, and we'll need to provide materials to the craftsman so he can start working on the airship's components.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_2.step3: This should be a good spot for take-off. We'll need to make sure the airship is stable and balanced before we can set off.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_3.step1: We've made good progress on the airship's framework, but we still need to build the engine. That's going to be a major undertaking.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_3.step2: Agreed. We'll need to provide the craftsman with all the materials he'll need to build a powerful and efficient engine.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_3.step3: Let's not forget that we're going to need all the power we can get if we're going to make it to that distant island so let's collect enough materials to build a proper engine.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_4.step1: The airship is built and the engine is running smoothly. But we still need to load it up with food and fuel before we can set off.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_4.step2: Right. We'll need to make sure we have enough supplies to last us for the entire journey, including any unforeseen circumstances.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_4.step3: Let's collect everything we can and load up the airship with it.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.dr2airship_4.step4: Sounds like a plan! Next stop, the distant island and the treasure that awaits us!
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer1a_0.step1: It seems like this island holds more secrets than a locked chest in a sunken ship. We need insight.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer1a_0.step2: And I might know just the source. Anyone heard a legend about a wise panda, a keeper of the dragon's lore?
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer1a_0.step3: A panda with answers, eh? Better than a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer1a_0.step4: Then it's decided. We seek out the sage panda. With any luck, she'll shine light on our path.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer1a_0.step5: To wisdom then! May this panda guide us through the fog of uncertainty.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproduct0a_0.step1: I still find it strange to see a panda on the dragon island.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproduct0a_0.step2: Strange or not, she has stories to tell—about the Holy Dragon that once harvested wheat here.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproduct0a_0.step3: Really? Did she share anything else?
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproduct0a_0.step4: Only hints. But she'll reveal more if we take over the wheat harvest in the dragon's absence.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproduct0a_0.step5: Well, we can't leave a mystery unsolved. To the wheat fields we go!
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drcustomermain3_1.step1: Withered trees, silent gong... Wait, are these dragon footprints?
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drcustomermain3_1.step2: Indeed these are. Apparently, without the Holy Dragon, everything has fallen apart.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drcustomermain3_1.step3: It feels as if life here hinges on the Holy Dragon's presence. We must find it.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drcustomermain3_1.step4: And we must also tend to these ruins. There's a balance we need to restore.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drcustomermain3_1.step5: Agreed. But let's tread carefully. Who knows what caused this desolation... or where the dragon has gone.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer2a_0.step1: We've delivered the wheat as promised. And look, the panda has given us a scroll.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer2a_0.step2: She said to take it to the Sacred Lake. Claims it holds the key to restoring harmony.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer2a_0.step3: It all sounds very vague... but also intriguing. A mystery wrapped in an enigma.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer2a_0.step4: Indeed. Yet, there's a thrill in the unknown. Let's set out for the lake with hopeful hearts.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drcustomerbridge1_0.step1: A bridge that's seen better days. Like everything else here... Do you think we can find collateral treasure for all our trouble there?
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drcustomerbridge1_0.step2: Perhaps. A secret island often holds secrets of its own. Yet, our main quest mustn't be sidelined.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drcustomerbridge1_0.step3: Agreed, the dragon remains our priority. But if fortune favors the bold, we might just hit two birds with one stone.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drcustomerbridge1_0.step4: Well said. We repair the bridge, uncover what's hidden, and keep our eyes on the prize—the harmony of this realm.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drcustomerbridge1_0.step5: Then let's get to work. For treasure, for truth, and for the adventure that beckons us forward!
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer1b_0.step1: All this renovation work... I'm starting to feel more like a builder than an adventurer. Could there be a shortcut to fix the temple and bring back the dragon?
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer1b_0.step2: The dragons whispered of a northern nomad with an eagle companion. She might just be our ticket to speeding things up.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer1b_0.step3: An eagle-eyed ally in the north? Let's seek her out and barter for information. I am certain that her bird has seen more of these lands than any map could show us.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproduct0b_0.step1: I can't believe we found her before turning into ice sculptures! Do you think it was worth braving the cold?
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproduct0b_0.step2: Absolutely. She requested carrots for her eagle companion, and in exchange, we'll receive its magical feathers.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproduct0b_0.step3: Well then, let's make this trade quickly. The sooner we have those feathers, the sooner we can witness their magic at work.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer2b_0.step1: The nomad accepted our carrot with a nod. In her silent way, she's given us the topknot feathers.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer2b_0.step2: These aren't just any feathers. They hold an aura of ancient magic. But how do we unlock their power?
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer2b_0.step3: The dragons hinted at a Place of Power. We are to present these feathers there as offerings.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer2b_0.step4: Offerings? Then it's not just a trade but a tribute. It's said that the Place of Power rewards those who honor the old ways.
dragonia_quests_json.Quest.drproducer2b_0.step5: Let's make haste then. If we present these feathers with respect, we may just get what we need.

dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_0.dragonia2.step1: Welcome back, team. I'm glad you're here. We've got a problem. The loggers have arrived, and they're planning to cut down the Tree of life. If we don't stop them, our home will be destroyed forever.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_0.dragonia2.step2: What can we do to help?
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_0.dragonia2.step3: There's a legend about a mystical flower that can stop anyone who wishes to harm the forest. It's said to be hidden on the highest branch of the Tree of Life. We need to get there before they do.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_1.dragonia2.step1: We've dealt with the Tree of Life before. How hard can it be?
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_1.dragonia2.step2: We need to find the first branch that holds the mystical flower. We'll need to climb up there, so yeah, it might not be that easy.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_2.dragonia2.step1: This path is treacherous. Watch your step.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_2.dragonia2.step2: Don't worry, I'll keep an eye out for everyone.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_2.dragonia2.step3: Look at all these beautiful flowers. I've never seen anything like them before.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_2.dragonia2.step4: Stay focused, everyone. We can admire the scenery once we find that flower.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_2.dragonia2.step5: Agreed. We don't know what dangers lie ahead.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_3.dragonia2.step1: This path is getting more dangerous. Are we getting close to the flower?
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_3.dragonia2.step2: Yes, we're almost there. Keep your eyes peeled for any signs of danger.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_4.dragonia2.step1: Do you hear that? It sounds like something is moving in the bushes.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_4.dragonia2.step3: Be careful. We don't know what's out there.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_5.dragonia2.step1: Look at the size of these vines. We'll have to cut through them.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_5.dragonia2.step2: Be careful not to damage the Tree of Life. It's our most valuable asset.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_6.dragonia2.step1: This is it, the entrance to the next stage of the Tree of Life. It's said to be guarded by a powerful enchantment.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_6.dragonia2.step2: Do you think you can break it?
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_6.dragonia2.step3: I can certainly try. But we need to be careful. The enchantment may have a dangerous side effect.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_7.dragonia2.step1: The enchantment is stronger than I thought. It's going to take some time to break it.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_7.dragonia2.step3: I know. Just keep an eye out for any danger while I work on this.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_8.dragonia2.step1: We've made it. But wait, something's not right.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_8.dragonia2.step3: This flower, it's not real. It's a decoy.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_9.dragonia2.step1: We need to find the real flower, and fast.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_9.dragonia2.step2: Any ideas where it could be?
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_9.dragonia2.step3: Wait, I remember something. The legend said the flower only blooms at night.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_10.dragonia2.step: Then we must wait until nightfall.
But how will we find it in the dark?
The flower is said to glow in the moonlight. We just need to keep our eyes open.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_11.dragonia2.step: Look, up there, on the highest branch!
That's it! We need to climb up there and get it.
Be careful, the Tree of Life is not to be trifled with.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_12.dragonia2.step: Hold on, what's that sound again?
It's coming from over there, behind those bushes.
This could be our chance to find the real flower. Let's go!
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_13.dragonia2.step: And just in time, the loggers are getting closer.
We need to use the flower to stop them.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_14.dragonia2.step: Wait, there's something written on this tree.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_15.dragonia2.step: I sense a powerful presence nearby.
It's hard to say. We need to be cautious.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_16.dragonia2.step: Look, there it is. The guardian of the flower.
We must fight it to protect the flower.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_17.dragonia2.step: Wait, let's think for a moment. Maybe there's another way.
Maybe we can reason with it. After all, it's been protecting the flower for a long time.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_18.dragonia2.step: It's worth a shot. But how do we communicate with it?
I can try to speak to it using the ancient language of the forest.
Be careful. We don't know what kind of magic it might possess.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_19.dragonia2.step: I'll try to reason with the guardian. Wish me luck!
Hurry, the loggers are getting closer!
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_20.dragonia2.step: The guardian heard my plea and let us take the flower.
It said that our intentions are good, but that we must not forget that with great power comes great responsibility.
Now, let's hurry back and use it to stop the loggers.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_21.dragonia2.step: So, how do we use the flower to stop the loggers?
We have to ground it and spread its particles all over Dragonia from the highest branch of the tree.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_22.dragonia2.step: I can see the loggers! They are coming closer to the tree of life. They are going to chop it down any moment now.
How far are we on grinding the flower so far?
We're very close! Just win us some more time.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_23.dragonia2.step: The magic flower powder is ready. Let's spread it!
I hope this works. Because, if it doesn't, we are all doomed.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_24.dragonia2.step: Oh my god, I think our plan worked. The loggers dropped their axes and saws and are preparing a picnic now.
What a fantastic sight. Let's go help them set everything up. We deserve a proper feast!
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_25.dragonia2.step: Once again, thank you for saving our land. I and the dragons are grateful.
Don't mention. It's always a pleasure to be back.
I hope that the next time we meet under less daunting circumstances.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.dr2elf_0.dragonia2.step1: The craftsman mentioned that we have an impressive demand. To assist with the workload, he's called upon his daughter to help fulfill the orders.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.dr2elf_0.dragonia2.step2: That's fantastic! Her assistance will undoubtedly expedite the construction process.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.dr2field_0.dragonia2.step1: Have you noticed how many of the locals are in need of wheat for their crafts? We could fill that void.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.dr2field_0.dragonia2.step2: I see, we grow the wheat, they get the resources they need, and we get something in return.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.dr2field_0.dragonia2.step3: Indeed. Remember, the more we cultivate, the more opportunities open up for us. Let's start planting!
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproducertrash_0.dragonia3.st: Our progress is steady, but we could use a bit of wisdom to enhance our production.
There's a sage in the village, an old soul with ancient knowledge. Perhaps he could lend us his expertise.
An old Chinese sage, you say? They say such sages are bridges to the past, with secrets for the present.
Let's pay him a visit. The right word from a wise man can often clear the path better than a day's labor.
To the sage, then. A few moments with him could spare us hours of toil.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass1_0.dragonia3.step: Doesn't this place look familiar? The birthing place of the legendary Terracotta Army... just  like in the prophecy. We need to restore five ancient relics to bring harmony back to these lands.
But how can we possibly find the rest? We're new to this island.

These relics are hard to miss due to their grandeur. Apart from the army, We're looking for The Pagoda, The Dragon, The Garden, and The Castle. We can use stars collected from erecting buildings to restore the relics.
Okay, and if we're ever stuck?
We have the ultimate guide - just a tap away. It'll show us where to find what we need and how to use it.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass1_5.dragonia3.step: Marvel at our work! From raw earth to a silent battalion standing guard. The Terracotta Army is complete.
A sight to behold indeed. And if legend holds true, this army is but one of many secrets buried in the folds of Dragon Island.
Then this is just the beginning. With the army complete, who knows what other ancient structures await our touch?
Let's keep our eyes open as we journey. If this island is truly a canvas of hidden wonders, we shall be the ones to uncover them all.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass2_5.dragonia3.step: Behold, the pagoda stands complete! A magnificent addition to Dragon Island's landscape.
Truly a cause for celebration. Our efforts have borne fruit, and this structure now stands as a beacon of our journey.
Yet, I can't help but feel this is just the beginning. The island still holds many secrets, many more structures to unveil.
Agreed. Each building we erect is a step deeper into the island's lore. Our adventure is far from over.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass3_5.dragonia3.step: The statue is restored! Once again, the imperial dragon stands tall, a majestic sight to behold.
Our efforts have breathed new life into this ancient guardian. It feels like we've rekindled a piece of the island's soul.
But our journey doesn't end here. The island still whispers of untold projects, waiting for our touch.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass4_5.dragonia3.step: The garden is ready! Every element is in place, achieving perfect harmony. A true oasis of peace.
It's more than just a garden; it's a testament to balance and beauty. We've really outdone ourselves this time.
But is our work here truly over? Dragon Island still holds so many mysteries, so many paths untraveled.
You're right. While we've achieved harmony here, the island's whispers still call to us, beckoning us to new adventures.
Then let's answer that call. Our journey continues, as long as there's a mystery to solve, a story to uncover.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass5_5.dragonia3.step: It's done. The castle stands majestic and proud. Our journey's work is now a part of the island's skyline.
And the rewards we've gathered are bountiful. But truly, being part of this journey... that's the real treasure.
Absolutely. The skills we've honed, the secrets we've uncovered, the bond we've forged with this land and each other...
It's more than I ever imagined when we first set foot on Dragon Island. We've built structures, but also, we've built memories.
Let's take a moment to cherish this. We've done something extraordinary. And while our work here is complete, the adventure... it never really ends.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproduct2a_0.dragonia3.step1: Panda was right. Reading the contents of the scroll by the sacred lake revealed the truth.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproduct2a_0.dragonia3.step2: It's dragon crystal – rarest mineral in whole of Dragonia. I am not surprised that this is the only thing that can bring the Holy Dragon back.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproduct2a_0.dragonia3.step3: Let's collect as many of them as we can and apply them. If we don't return the dragon in time, this realm will be forever lost.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drcustomermain3_1.dragonia3.st: I can't believe my eyes! We managed to bring the Holy Dragon back.
He said that he was possesed by an evil witch and is very thankful for his salvation. He will grant his ultimate treasure island once the Holy area is fully restored.
That's very nice of him. But we should be careful from now on. Who know's what is the evil witch is capable of now that she lost her catch.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproducer2a_0.dragonia3.step1: This must be the Sacred Lake, shimmering with a light that seems to dance on the water's surface.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproducer2a_0.dragonia3.step2: It's exactly as the panda described. Speaking of which, isn't this the place where we're supposed to read the scroll she gave us?
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproducer2a_0.dragonia3.step3: Yes, you're right. The scroll's secrets are to be revealed here. The waters might hold the key to decoding its mysteries.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproducer2b_0.dragonia3.step1: This must be the Place of Power. It feels charged with an ancient energy.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproducer2b_0.dragonia3.step2: The perfect spot to present the magical feathers. The air's almost humming with anticipation.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproducer2b_0.dragonia3.step3: Let's do this with reverence. These feathers are more than just gifts; they're symbols of our journey and respect for this land.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproducer0a_0.dragonia3.step1: Here they are, the wheat beds. This is what the panda sought.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproducer0a_0.dragonia3.step2: They've been untended for some time. The dragon's absence is felt even in the grain.
dragonia_unitStories_json.UnitStory.drproducer0a_0.dragonia3.step3: Let's get to work then. Harvesting this wheat is the first step in unravelling this island's mysteries.

halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_find.step1: Look over there, in the distance! Is that a castle gleaming under the moonlight?
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_find.step2: It seems so! But it doesn’t look quite right for this spooky season, does it?
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_find.step3: You’re right. It’s oddly bright and cheerful... Almost enchanting in a non-spooky way.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_find.step4: We should get a closer look. Maybe there is a tiny spider web or a baby ghost not visible from afar...
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_0.step1: On the second thought, even if we hang a bat in one of the corners, the castle will still look too cheerful, don't you agree?
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_0.step2: You’re right. There’s a persistent aura of enchantment that our decorations alone cannot dispel.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_0.step3: This must be the work of a potent spell, something that mere decorations cannot counteract.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_0.step4: Disenchanting a fairy’s work is tricky... We’ll need help from the mystical beings of the island.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_0.step5: Let’s embark on a quest, then! We must find someone who can help us lift the spell and bring the full spooky back to this castle in time for Halloween!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_1.step1: It's obvious, though, that mere decorations won't break the spell. The fairy’s enchantment is deeply woven into the castle’s very stones.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_1.step2: Our quest continues, then. To truly bring the Halloween spirit to this castle, we must delve deeper into the mysteries of disenchantment alongside our new allies.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_2.step1: Look at how far we’ve come! The castle, once cheerfully enchanted, now begins to whisper tales of the eerie and the unknown.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_2.step2: Indeed, each cobweb and shadow brings us closer to a true Halloween spectacle. But the final threads of the enchantment still linger.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_2.step3: The fairy’s magic is potent, but we’ve gathered allies, knowledge, and spooky decorations that have begun to pierce through its cheerful veil.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcastle_2.step4: We are on the brink! Let’s muster our courage, gather our wits, and dispel the remaining enchantment to unveil a castle truly fit for Halloween!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlhag_0.step1: To disenchant the castle, we’ll need potent magic, something beyond our abilities.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlhag_0.step2: I’ve heard tales of a local Alchemist, dwelling deep within the mystical woods, who possesses the power to counter even the strongest enchantments.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlhag_0.step3: Ah, the Alchemist of the woods! Legends say she can brew potions to alter any spell or curse.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlhag_0.step4: Then our path is clear. We must seek her out and plead for her assistance to bring the spooky back to our castle!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlflittermouse_3.step1: Now that we’re closer, it’s clear something’s amiss. This castle is devoid of any Halloween fright!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlflittermouse_3.step2: It’s as if a fairy has washed away every ounce of spookiness with a wave of her wand!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlflittermouse_3.step3: We can’t let it stay this way, especially not with Halloween around the corner. It needs its eerie charm back.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlflittermouse_3.step4: While we ponder on a bigger solution, let's start by adding our own spooky touches to the castle.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlflittermouse_3.step5: A splendid idea! A bat, with its shadowy figure flapping amidst the castle’s towers, would surely add a creepy vibe.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcaldron_7.step1: I braved the shadows and spoke to the Alchemist of the woods...
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcaldron_7.step2: The suspense is killing us! What did she say???
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcaldron_7.step3: She agreed to assist, but not without a condition. We must first find her cherished, lucky cauldron.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlgnome_2.step1: Do you hear the ancient trees whispering secrets of a hidden entity within this spooky realm?
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlgnome_2.step2: Indeed! They speak of a Halloween gnome, shrouded in mystery and playful mischief, lurking amidst the shadows and enchantments!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlgnome_2.step3: The trees hint at a reward, a landmark for our main land, should we manage to find this elusive creature during our spooky endeavors.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlgnome_2.step4: A landmark, the Halloween Castle, that will stand as a testament to our adventures, echoing the eerie and mystical in every crevice of our domain!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlgnome_2.step5: Let’s weave this new thread into our tale, seeking the gnome to forever embed the spirit of this Halloween quest into our main land!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlmummie_0.step1: Having the Alchemist of the woods as an ally is a boon, but in this mystical endeavor, additional allies wouldn’t be amiss.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlmummie_0.step2: Indeed, more friends on this eerie journey could tilt the scales in our favor.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlmummie_0.step3: Tales from my childhood speak of a forest mummy, shrouded in ancient linens and lingering amidst the twisted trees.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlmummie_0.step4: Perhaps this mummy holds secrets or powers that could aid us.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlmummie_0.step5: I always thought of it as a bedtime story meant to instill fear and excitement. But now, wandering through these mystical woods, the legend seems all too plausible...
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlspider_3.step1: Although the bat adds a touch of the eerie, this castle still lacks the chilling charm of Halloween!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlspider_3.step2: You’re right. One bat won’t undo a fairy’s enchantment. But perhaps, adding a spider, weaving its silken threads, might amplify the spookiness a bit?
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlspider_3.step3: Indeed, a spider weaving a web in the moonlight can cast the most haunting shadows. But where can we find one in these enchanted woods?
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlspider_3.step4: Let's ask one of our new spooky friends for help! They might know where to find a spider to add to our growing collection of eerie decorations.
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcandle_3.step1: The spider, with its nimble legs, has begun to weave a tapestry of webs around the castle!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcandle_3.step2: A splendid, spooky sight indeed! But the ambiance still lacks a certain... spectral glow, wouldn’t you say?
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcandle_3.step3: Ah, you’ve hit the nail on the coffin! What we need are candles, but not just any candles - they must cast an eerie light to truly bring forth the Halloween spirit!
halloween_quests_json.Quest.hlcandle_3.step4: A quest for the spectral candles it is, then! Their ghostly light will surely illuminate our path to a perfectly haunted castle!

halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlfranky_0.step1: Welcome to Halloween Island! I know it might look spooky but celebrating Halloween here has been a tradition for years now.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlfranky_0.step2: And what is my role in all that? They seem to be doing good on their own. Maybe, except for this guy.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlfranky_0.step3: As you know from experience, extra aid never hurts! Let’s start by helping our monster reinvent himself.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlfranky_1.step1: He looks great, well done you! I am sure the monster will gladly help us in return.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlfranky_1.step2: Should we take him trick-or-treating with us? I bet all the sweets will be ours.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlfranky_1.step3: There is time for everything. Now we should focus on exploring the woods. Let’s collect the thank-you pumpkins from the monster and be on our way!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_0.step1: First monsters, now haunted houses. Are you trying to scare me off?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_0.step2: On the contrary! I am finally ready to share some spooky secrets with you. But first, let’s find some more Halloween attributes.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_1.step1: The Halloween spirit is strong with you! That is exactly what House of Halloween needs.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_1.step3: Oh, did I not tell you yet? Let’s discuss it after collecting more attributes!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_2.step1: You see, Halloween spirit is what keeps House of Halloween alive. The more attributes we collect, the bigger it gets.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_2.step2: Why does it have to get bigger?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_2.step3: To accommodate all the monsters and creatures alike to celebrate Halloween under one roof!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_3.step1: Halloween is soon. Do we have to finish with the house before it?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_3.step2: Not necessarily. But let’s not extend our welcome here. I don’t think that we will be very welcome here after the celebration is over.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_4.step1: Do you know how this island was discovered?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_4.step2: Of course. It was found by your ancestors. Generations ago.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_4.step3: So I am not the first one from my family to celebrate Halloween here?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_4.step4: No. As I said before, it’s a long-lasting tradition. And you’re a part of it now!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_5.step1: Can we invite others to help us prepare for the celebration?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_5.step2: Great idea! It will definitely help us finish in time.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_6.step1: This is probably the strangest place I’ve been invited to.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_6.step2: The same here. Do you have any idea what’s happening?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_6.step3: No. Let’s wait for the host to explain everything.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_7.step1: You’re here, guys! Thank you for coming.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_7.step2: Thanks for inviting us to the scariest place in the world. I guess…
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_7.step3: I know it looks strange but it will all make sense soon, I promise!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_8.step1: Now that we understand it all, the surroundings don't seem that frightening.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_8.step2: Does this mean that you will stay and help me build the house of Halloween?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_8.step3: Of course we will. The adventure is not fun if you can’t share it with your friends!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_9.step1: How much time do we have left?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_9.step2: Not much, but enough to finish the construction if we work as a team.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_9.step3: Let’s look for more attributes then!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_10.step1: Were you scared when you came here the first time?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_10.step2: Of course! Look around… But I was looking forward to becoming a part of this spooky tradition.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_10.step3: And we are curious to see what the house full of ghosts looks like when filled with monsters!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_11.step1: I just wanted to warn you all, that, even though we’re doing great and are on track, we still have to be careful.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_11.step2: Agreed! Let’s stick together and watch out for one another.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_12.step1: Aren’t you guys hungry? How about we halt here and enjoy some delicious snacks?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_12.step2: I am afraid we cannot afford that. The time is limited and we still have a lot to do. So let’s keep going!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_13.step1: Don’t you find the Dark Forest intriguing and enticing? I wonder what’s in its deepest woods…
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_13.step2: If anything, I find it eerie. And I definitely would not want to go there alone. Let’s stay close!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_14.step2: Yes. We were just talking by the House of Halloween. Let me check there!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_15.step3: Our host is gone! What are we going to do? We’re doomed!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_15.step4: Let’s not panic here. We should stay calm and keep looking.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_16.step1: What were you doing when you were together for the last time?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_16.step2: We were just talking about… Oh no!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_16.step4: I think I know where we need to go!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_17.step2: Yes, we discussed what it must be like in the deepest woods of the forest…
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_17.step3: What a strange thing to talk about.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_17.step4: I know… Do you think it might have been some curse?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_17.step5: It is always a possibility on Halloween island. Let’s explore this theory!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_18.step1: I just spoke with the locals. They confirmed that the forest was bewitched to lure everyone in.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_18.step2: What are we supposed to do now?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_18.step3: Just keep looking. The forest will tell us what to do next.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_18.step4: Explore the forest, find our friend, save Halloween. Sounds like a plan!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_19.step1: I think I saw something down the trail. But I don't think it's who we looking for.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_19.step2: Whatever this was, it might help us with our search. And we can’t pass on an opportunity like this.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_20.step1: The bad news is that it was just some forest spirit. Would you like to hear the good part?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_20.step3: It told me that if we dig even deeper there will be a note with all the answers we seek.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_20.step4: Great. We find the note - we find our friend. Luck is finally on our side!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_21.step1: I guess we’re out of luck again. The note says that what we seek is in the House of Halloween.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_21.step3: Nevertheless, we should take our chances. Let’s split!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_22.step2: I think you should stay here and keep exploring the forest. I will check on the House of Halloween.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_23.step1: Oh my god, you were actually here this whole time?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_23.step2: Yes. I was preparing the house for celebration while you were feeding it with Halloween spirit. That’s what I call teamwork!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_23.step4: Remember not letting me have some treats? I hope you enjoyed my trick because I did!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_24.step1: Guys, stop doing whatever you’re doing and come with me. I have to show you something!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_24.step2: Why is everyone on this island acting so weird?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_24.step3: I stopped asking myself this question the second we arrived here…
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_25.step1: Surprise! Consider the best trick of this Halloween season finished!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_25.step2: I can’t believe we fell for it… But fair play to you.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_25.step3: Can I kindly have my well-deserved sweets now?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_25.step4: Sure, we collected enough candies to feed the entire island. Even the monster whom you persuaded to put us on the wrong track. Let’s celebrate!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlmummie_0.step1: It's even scarier to approach the mummy than talking to the alchemist of the woods!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlmummie_0.step2: Did you manage to learn anything?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlmummie_0.step3: Yes. The mummy will help us find a bat for the castle, but it seeks a magic elixir in return for its guidance.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlmummie_0.step4: Accidentally, we already know someone who is good with elixirs!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcaldron_7.step1: The cauldron, aged and seasoned with countless spells, is finally in our possession!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcaldron_7.step2: A triumph indeed! Now, the alchemist can brew her potent concoctions once more.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcaldron_7.step3: But we mustn’t forget, the elixir for the mummy requires specific, perhaps enigmatic, ingredients.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcaldron_7.step4: True, we must scour the land, from murky swamps to enchanted groves, to gather what is needed for the brew.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlflittermouse_0.step1: Behold, the bat egg, a rarity in our mystical realm, now lies within our grasp!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlflittermouse_0.step2: A monumental find! The mummy held true to its word, guiding us to this precious beginning.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlflittermouse_0.step3: I hope it enjoyed every last drop of the elixir. Although I know what its made of and hard it find to believe that something like this can taste good.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlflittermouse_0.step4: To each his own! Yet, even as the bat will soon take wing, our journey is far from its end.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlspider_0.step1: Look at this, a spider egg, delicately wrapped in the finest of silken threads, now in our hands!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlspider_0.step2: An eerie yet exciting discovery! These eight-legged architects will surely spin a web of fright throughout the castle!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlspider_0.step3: I can already imagine the moonlight gently illuminating the delicate, dew-kissed webs on a crisp Halloween night.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlspider_0.step4: And think of the shadows they'll cast! But let’s not get too entwined in the future, our quest is still weaving its path ahead of us.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcandle_0.step1: Ah-ha! The first light, a beacon in our dark quest, is now found!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcandle_0.step2: Its ghostly glow pierces through the darkness, promising to cast eerie shadows across our castle!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcandle_0.step3: But one light alone cannot dispel the lingering cheerfulness of the fairy’s enchantment. We must seek the candelabra to amplify its spectral glow.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcandle_0.step4: Indeed, the eerie candelabra, legendary for its haunting luminescence, will be the key to enveloping the castle in a truly spooky aura!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlgnome_0.step1: Wow, we've uncovered the first stage of the Halloween gnome!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlgnome_0.step2: Oh, this is thrilling! But it's merely the beginning, with two more stages lurking ahead of us.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlgnome_0.step3: Indeed, but every step draws us nearer to our coveted goal – acquiring this unique Halloween Castle for our homeland.
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlgnome_0.step4: Just imagine, every glance at it will whisk us back to these adventurous moments!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlgnome_0.step5: Let's forge ahead in our search, fueled by renewed vigor and enthusiasm!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcastle_3.step1: Behold, our castle, now shrouded in a splendidly spooky aura, stands ready to host the most haunting of Halloween nights!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcastle_3.step2: The webs glisten under the ghostly glow of the eerie candelabra, and the bats flutter, casting eerie shadows upon the ancient walls!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcastle_3.step3: We’ve successfully pierced through the fairy’s enchantment, allowing the spirits of Halloween to dance freely through each corridor and tower!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcastle_3.step4: Our quest, though fraught with challenges and mysteries, has woven a tale that will be whispered through the realms for eons to come!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcastle_3.step5: Now, let the celebrations commence, as we revel under the moonlight, amidst the specters and sprites, in our splendidly spooky castle!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlgnome_2.step1: The gnome, with its twinkling eyes and mischievous grin, now stands before us, a splendid find amidst our spectral journey!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlgnome_2.step2: The Halloween Castle, a reward for our perseverance, will stand tall in our main land, a perpetual reminder of our eerie adventures and the mysteries unraveled in this haunted quest!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcaldron_0.step1: Look, we've stumbled upon the first blob of... something!
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcaldron_0.step2: Intriguing! I believe this is a crucial component for the alchemist's concoction, isn’t it?
halloween_unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlcaldron_0.step3: Indeed, it is! But remember, this is just the initial ingredient. We have a ways to go before the cauldron is within our reach.

project_json.Tutorial.dwarf.step1: Welcome to The Mergest Kingdom! Do you mind helping me get back into my body by merging these helmets?
project_json.Tutorial.wheat_3_tutorial.step1: You can also merge these sprouts to grow wheat. I'm starving!
project_json.Tutorial.wheat_3_tutorial.step3: Almost there! One last merge is required to prepare wheat for harvest.
project_json.Tutorial.dishes_0.step1: Press on the wheat to harvest it.
project_json.Tutorial.dishes_0.step2: Don't forget to collect the wheat. We will need it later.
project_json.Tutorial.dishes_0.step3: Good job! Now we have enough ingredients to trade them for the keys.
project_json.Tutorial.dishes_0.step5: I know how to open a door with a key. Let's learn to open new territories with it!
project_json.Tutorial.dishes_0.step6: Let's use it to open new territories!
project_json.Tutorial.wood_1.step1: Those weeds are everywhere but even the most evil ent is a great source of wood! Let's chop!
project_json.Tutorial.wood_1.step2: Now we can collect the wood in case we want to build something.
project_json.Tutorial.wood_1.step3: What a fine line-up of logs, I bet we can make the smoothest planks out of them!
project_json.Tutorial.wood_2.step1: It's important to cut the ents clear. We don't want them to feel at home.
project_json.Tutorial.wood_2.step2: I have the fastest saw in the Kingdom. Press here to see for yourself!
project_json.Tutorial.wood_2.step3: Evil spirits thought that an ent is a good place to hide their treasure? Finders keepers!
project_json.Tutorial.wood_2.step4: No good deed goes unnoticed. It's time to collect our reward for making the world a better place!
project_json.Tutorial.build_wood_2.step1: We're half way there! Let's finish what we've started by pressing on this wooden frame.
project_json.Tutorial.build_wood_2.step2: And don't forget about my supersonic saw.
project_json.Tutorial.woodgenerator_1.step1: It won't be easy to fight the ents off but it's well worth it!
project_json.Tutorial.woodgenerator_1.step2: Let's cut this behemoth and its offsprings so we can move on to the next one!
project_json.Tutorial.kraken_0.step1: Press on the kraken to use the keys.
project_json.Tutorial.crystal.step1: Who am I to question magic scrolls contents? Let’s see how to use this potion and put what we've learned to practice.
project_json.Tutorial.story_fruitshop_0.step1: This is my favorite place in the whole Kingdom! I can't wait to spend all of my coins on these delicious crops.
project_json.Tutorial.story_resourceshop_0.step1: I'd prefer for them to sell food but it's a nice place to get treats for my dear ginger friend!
project_json.Tutorial.story_discountshop_0.step1: What a peculiar spot. I've heard that you can find many useful things here. Let's see!
project_json.Tutorial.salepass.step1: It’s shopping season time! Now, with each purchase you make comes a crystal. The more crystals you get, the more rewards you'll receive.

project_json.Units.dwarf.describe: Never full and always hungry, Hog Rider is constantly on the lookout. Born and raised in Farawake Kingdom, he’ll do whatever it takes to fill it with his stout presence. But underneath this heavy exterior is a very sensitive although still ravenous person.
project_json.Units.king.describe: Nobody knows the Kingdom better than the… Khm, king. Don’t be fooled by McArthur’s grey hair. He’s never been more alive with his eyes set on new territories. Reminds you of someone as ambitious? The two of you’ve met at the right time.
project_json.Units.bear.describe: The smartest one in the room. Not the bear but the person. Grizzly comes from a long line of scientists and proudly carries on the Bearington banner making the Kingdom a better place with his innovative building solutions.
project_json.Units.warlock.describe: If you’re tired of card tricks and top hats filled with rabbits you won’t be disappointed when you meet the Enchantress. Her work ethic is exemplary, and her skills in spells are unmatched. Plus she has a very good memory. Try reading all these books, and not to forget a single incantation.
project_json.Units.elf.describe: If you ever decide to put an apple on your head for somebody to hit it with an arrow don’t reach out to Emeralda. Not because she’ll miss. She’ll hit it 10 times out of 10. She’s just too religious about her sacred arrows which were given to her by her teacher, the greatest elf archer who has ever lived.
project_json.Units.troll.describe: He might not be as articulate or gracious as a regular member of the Royal Army but his strengths lie in other areas. You won’t find yourself a more loyal, courageous, and fearless warrior.
project_json.Units.knight.describe: The lonely wolf of Mount Bloom restlessly wanders the Farawake lands keeping an eye on the common folk. His chivalry has no limits and his sword is second to none. He’ll be a great addition to any team if you teach him to be a part of one.
project_json.Units.hunter.describe: Behind this cold exterior is a warm heart. But you can only get to it by melting it. Before that prepare to be treated with a grain of salt. It’s a pity you weren’t born an animal since this is the only species she can trust since it doesn't have a long history of betrayal written all over their kind.
project_json.Units.centaur.describe: Always with a book in hand, Alvin has traveled the realm back and forth looking for an answer to the eternal question: can science beat sorcery? Not fortunate enough to possess any magical skills he was destined to become a true know-it-all.
project_json.Units.gnomes.describe: Big and Bob, Bob and Big. For as long as they know themselves they were always inseparable. What glued them together wasn’t an adhesive but the explosives. Brought up on a mine they fell in love with mining things. It became and obsession that grew into a profession. If you need to remove an obstacle of any grander, these are your guys.
project_json.Units.shark.describe: The inventor of Coral Armor and the conqueror of Seven Seas can only look intimidating. With a musket in one fin and a bottle of rum in the other, the most infamous pirate of the realm is ready to reveal himself to those who are brave enough to challenge him. Be it in the water or on the land, the game is afoot.
project_json.Units.fish.describe: A fish of extraordinary abilities, Cyber Fin was once the trusted companion of the infamous Shark Pirate. Equipped with advanced aquatic gear, she can navigate the darkest depths and spot treasures from afar.
project_json.Units.panda.describe: A mythical figure born under a glowing bamboo shoot, Luna Bamboo is both a scholar and warrior. With an uncanny connection to nature and ancient spirits, she wields an unworldly wisdom that guides those who seek her aid. Enigmatic and powerful, Luna stands as a beacon of strength in a world filled with uncertainties.
project_json.Quest.IconForce: A dull pencil is better than the sharpest mind! Let's see what we have to do to improve the Kingdom.

project_json.moneyFog1.name: Magic Island
project_json.moneyFog1.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and dozens of useful items! Boost your progress and help your friends save the Kingdom!
project_json.moneyFog2.name: Mediterranean Cay
project_json.moneyFog2.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and the best housewarming gift of all! Once upon a time, this cay belonged to a very dear friend of King McArthur who would've been proud of what you have achieved.
project_json.moneyFog3.name: Enchanted Atoll
project_json.moneyFog3.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land filled with royal riches! Rumor has it that this treasure can only be collected by the noblest one of all...
project_json.moneyFog4.name: Land of opportunities
project_json.moneyFog4.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and lots of bonus items to grow your presence! Others can already feel how your Kingdom is getting stronger each day. It's about time to consolidate your positions before they strike!
project_json.moneyFog5.name: Winterland
project_json.moneyFog5.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and shiny valuables covered with snow! Make sure that the South Pole is on your side since these lands are filled with gifts!
project_json.moneyFog6.name: Builder's paradise
project_json.moneyFog6.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and an army of mechanical workers! This is a great opportunity to take advantage of Royal Army’s conquests and expand your Kingdom’s greatness on to new territories!
project_json.moneyFog7.name: Turquoise Harbour
project_json.moneyFog7.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and a bunch of universal goods! The Kingdom is growing so does the need for new equipment and resources. Take advantage of this victorious momentum!
project_json.moneyFog8.name: Evergreen haven
project_json.moneyFog8.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and expand your main island! If you ever dreamed of more space to accommodate your ambitious royal plans this is your chance!
project_json.moneyFog9.name: Abundant Desert
project_json.moneyFog9.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and become an owner of the most profuse wilderness in the whole realm! Think strategically and plan your expansion to capacitate the defense forces and produce more resources!
project_json.moneyFog10.name: Magical mirage
project_json.moneyFog10.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and harness the power of the sand with valuable resources! Nobody said that building a pyramid is going to be a piece of cake but this is your best chance to succeed!
project_json.moneyFog11.name: Oriental superiority
project_json.moneyFog11.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and capture your greatness! There are many legends in the Seventh Realm and you can become one yourself by perpetuating your contribution to the Kingdom’s growth and development!
project_json.moneyFog12.name: Polar light
project_json.moneyFog12.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Farawake land and capture your greatness! There are many legends in the Seventh Realm and you can become one yourself by perpetuating your contribution to the Kingdom’s growth and development!
