quests_json.Quest.wheat_3.step1: I guess I had even more than I thought! Everything is so foggy! I have to eat before I go crazy. Come on, let's farm by merging these plants!
quests_json.Quest.dishes_0.step1: Now, let's get the ingredients and bring them to the tavern. Maybe I will find answers there. I'm so desperate that I'm ready to share my own food for that.
quests_json.Quest.wood_1.step1: Gingerbeard! It so nice to see a familiar face. Do you happen to know where did this log come from?
quests_json.Quest.wood_1.step2: This is what you get for defeating the ents. I've been sharpening my saw, waiting to be freed. Let's get more logs and build something.
quests_json.Quest.wood_3.step1: Does it look like something you would consider living in?
quests_json.Quest.wood_3.step2: Are you serious? I'm not even sure if my thumb will fit in there.
quests_json.Quest.wood_3.step3: Well, in that case, you better get to sawing! And I'll try to conquer as many lands as I can so you could have enough ents to play with.
quests_json.Quest.wood_4.step1: Look! It's perfect. You can move in whenever you want.
quests_json.Quest.wood_4.step2: I might appear simple but I'm used to a much higher standards of living. Come on, let's conquer new lands to mine more wood.
quests_json.Quest.wood_5.step1: It's definitely getting bigger! I bet we could fit your entire beard in there.
quests_json.Quest.wood_5.step2: Sounds plausible but we can do better than this. Ents, we're coming!
quests_json.Quest.wood_6.step1: How much more wood do we need to make this place even bigger?
quests_json.Quest.wood_6.step2: The more wood we need the less ents we will keep. That's everything I need to know!
quests_json.Quest.wood_7.step1: I think it's the best we can do.
quests_json.Quest.wood_7.step2: Oh, my dear friend. You have no idea how much more we're capable of!
quests_json.Quest.king_1.step1: What's a crown doing here? What can it possibly mean?
quests_json.Quest.king_1.step2: I bet invaders forgot to hide it inside their ents. Let's dig deeper!
quests_json.Quest.king_2.step1: Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
quests_json.Quest.king_2.step2: I think that both of our heads are too big for this crown. Let's find its rightful owner!
quests_json.Quest.dragonisland_1.step1: It feels strange to greet the king empty-handed.
quests_json.Quest.dragonisland_1.step2: I know a place where we can find lots of things but it's not for everyone.
quests_json.Quest.dragonisland_1.step3: I'm scared of nothing. Can you take me there now?
quests_json.Quest.dragonisland_1.step4: Alright, but don't say that I didn't warn you!
quests_json.Quest.bear_1.step2: Again? You always get overly-excited... Oh dear lord! It's an actual Cave Hammer!
quests_json.Quest.bear_1.step3: It doesn't sound all that powerful to me.
quests_json.Quest.bear_1.step4: Wait till you meet its owner!
quests_json.Quest.bear_2.step2: Again? You always get overly-excited... Oh dear lord! It's an actual Cave Hammer!
quests_json.Quest.bear_2.step3: It doesn't sound all that powerful to me.
quests_json.Quest.bear_2.step4: Wait till you meet its owner!
quests_json.Quest.bear_3.step1: How many hammers are there? Do we even need them?
quests_json.Quest.bear_3.step2: I don't get it. We probably went to the same school, but why are you so whiny and I'm not?
quests_json.Quest.bear_3.step3: Who is whiny, me? I don't whine about you being so annoyingly active.
quests_json.Quest.bear_3.step4: Don't waste your energy on arguing, lads. We need more of those hammers. Keep sawing!
quests_json.Quest.bear_4.step1: The hammers are getting heavier and heavier. I'm not sure that there is anyone at all who can hold them, let alone use them!
quests_json.Quest.bear_4.step2: Of course you think it's heavy, look at your tiny arms!
quests_json.Quest.bear_4.step3: My arms are just fine. Yours are just too fat. I'll take a break while you saw. You need to exercise more.
quests_json.Quest.bear_5.step1: Do we even know why it's called Honey Hammer? Can it summon honey?
quests_json.Quest.bear_5.step2: Here we go again. We have a lot of work but only thing you do is think about food.
quests_json.Quest.bear_5.step3: What's wrong with that? Food makes me happy.
quests_json.Quest.bear_5.step4: And fat. Let's find more hammers to see if they can summon anything at all.
quests_json.Quest.candies_4.step1: Looks like I'm hungry again... These pumpkins seem pretty tasty to me.
quests_json.Quest.candies_4.step2: They are all yours. But don't expect me to collect them for you. My heart belongs to sawing!
quests_json.Quest.wood_9.step1: Looks like we've finally found it! Is this place big enough for you?
quests_json.Quest.wood_9.step2: For me? It can fit a whole squadron. Now we just have to recruit one.
quests_json.Quest.wood_9.step3: Before we do, let's finish the construction. What do you need to do that?
quests_json.Quest.wood_9.step4: I need to sharpen my saw and find myself some ents.
quests_json.Quest.wood_9.step5: And I need to eat something. Sounds like a great plan!
quests_json.Quest.stone_1.step1: I was looking for some food but this is what I've found.
quests_json.Quest.stone_1.step2: I'll do my best to keep you full but in the meantime keep looking for more stone so we could build a fort.
quests_json.Quest.stone_2.step1: I already know that you're good with wood but how about other materials?
quests_json.Quest.stone_2.step2: I can build anything out of everything. Watch and learn!
quests_json.Quest.stone_3.step1: This is what you call erecting a building? Can't you do anything without my help?
quests_json.Quest.stone_3.step2: Don't you like it? I was kind of thinking that it was perfect for you.
quests_json.Quest.stone_3.step3: If we have to rebuild our Kingdom from scratch I'll make sure that I have the biggest palace.
quests_json.Quest.stone_4.step1: I can't believe that I'm saying this but you were actually right. It is prefect for me. I'll use it as a shed for keeping old things.
quests_json.Quest.stone_4.step2: As you wish. Although, I know that you don't have anything since the invaders took everything away, remember?
quests_json.Quest.stone_5.step1: This is looking wonderful. Whom should I thank for such a great architectural achievement?
quests_json.Quest.stone_5.step2: You should thank all of us, your highness. And be sure that we're capable of even greater things.
quests_json.Quest.stone_6.step1: We could use it as a watchtower to look after evil creatures so they stay under control.
quests_json.Quest.stone_6.step2: For the time being, yes. But since we are planning to have an army of our own we'll need a place to feed the soldiers...
quests_json.Quest.stone_7.step1: This tavern looks delicious. Should I go in there and test it out?
quests_json.Quest.stone_7.step2: Not before we rebuild it and turn into something else.
quests_json.Quest.stone_8.step1: How do you like it now?
quests_json.Quest.stone_8.step2: You ruined a perfectly nice building but I'll get over it. Eventually. When I eat something.
quests_json.Quest.stone_10.step1: This is it. This citadel will mark the beginning of the new Farawake Kingdom. Even stronger and more prosperous one.
quests_json.Quest.stone_10.step2: Your spirit and belief is what keeps us going.
quests_json.Quest.stone_10.step3: I know that there aren't many of us yet but we can do great things together.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_1.step1: Is there anyone in our team who can work with metal?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_1.step2: Don't look at me. I've done the most important part already. I rescued you.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_1.step3: I don't know if you could tell by my armor but I happen to know a thing or two about alloys.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_2.step1: So, what do we do about those beams?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_2.step2: They'll make a great foundation for our future buildings. Let's get some more!
quests_json.Quest.wagon_3.step1: Are you building an igloo? I didn't know that you were a polar bear...
quests_json.Quest.wagon_3.step2: You could've actually learned something if you were using your eyes instead of your mouth more often.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_4.step1: Grizzly, is this is what I think it is?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_4.step2: Yes, sir. I figured that we might need something like this in our situation.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_4.step3: What is it? I don't understand.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_4.step4: Once again, more watching, less talking.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_5.step2: I'm curious. What do you see?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_5.step3: Okay, you got me. Still no idea.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_5.step4: Be patient, my friend. Just help me get more resources and soon you will see everything.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_6.step1: You might not know that but Grizzly comes from a very long line of scientists.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_6.step2: Really? You don't say. He looks more like a warrior.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_6.step3: I'm many things but my heart will always belong to knowledge. I hope that you'll like my new laboratory.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_7.step1: This looks nice. What are you planning on doing with it?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_7.step2: First off, I got to finish building it so your help will be much appreciated.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_8.step1: I got a little hungry from being so overly helpful and I was wondering if there is a way for you to create something tasty and filling in there?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_8.step2: Don't mind him. He always talks about food. Is there anything else we can do?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_8.step3: It's okay. Thank you. I'll try and make something when we're done.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_10.step1: This is where I'm going to build my laboratory. What do you think?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_10.step2: I think it's a great solution. Even if it's not we can always put it somewhere else.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_10.step3: Yeah, you can always count on us. We've got your back!
quests_json.Quest.elf_1.step1: Are there any hunters among us?
quests_json.Quest.elf_1.step4: It's too early to jump to conclusions. Let's collect some more and see what happens.
quests_json.Quest.elf_2.step1: I'm not even sure if anyone here is any good at archery.
quests_json.Quest.elf_2.step2: Why would anyone want a bow if you've got a saw?
quests_json.Quest.elf_2.step4: I had my share of doubts but now I'm almost certain that this quiver belongs to a more sophisticated being than us.
quests_json.Quest.elf_3.step1: What if nobody comes to claim those arrows? Can I keep them then?
quests_json.Quest.elf_3.step2: Why do you even want them? They aren't edible.
quests_json.Quest.elf_3.step3: I'm going to use them as a big, nice fork.
quests_json.Quest.elf_4.step1: What if nobody comes to claim those arrows? Can I keep them then?
quests_json.Quest.elf_4.step2: Why do you even want them? They aren't edible.
quests_json.Quest.elf_4.step3: I'm going to use them as a big, nice fork.
quests_json.Quest.elf_5.step1: The more arrows we find the scarier it becomes.
quests_json.Quest.elf_5.step3: What if their owner decides to use them against us?
quests_json.Quest.elf_5.step4: I guess you were also scared when you saw me for the first time. Look at us now. Thick as thieves!
quests_json.Quest.elf_6.step1: Does it get any better than this? Who wouldn't want to have such a gorgeous bow?
quests_json.Quest.elf_6.step2: What do you know about bows? And, most of all, about beauty? Let's just wait for the owner to reveal herself.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_1.step1: Great news! I think I've just found a new recipe. I can finally cook something new.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_1.step2: Let me see. Hm... It's not a recipe for a dish. It's a recipe for a potion.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_1.step3: I didn't know there were witches allowed into the Farawake Kingdom.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_1.step4: Maybe she is not from around here...
quests_json.Quest.warlock_2.step3: I've just found the second variable of that magical equation and kind of want to read what's on it.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_2.step4: I don't think that it's such a good idea. We wouldn't know what to do with it even if we were proficient in the languages required.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_3.step1: I wonder who is the owner of these books. I've never seen anything like it before.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_3.step2: That's what we thought when we've found your bow.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_3.step3: It's funny how you're always unable to use the things you find.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_4.step1: I wonder who is the owner of these books. I've never seen anything like it before.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_4.step2: That's what we thought when we've found your bow.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_4.step3: It's funny how you're always unable to use the things you find.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_5.step1: How many more spells are out there? Because I keep on finding these books...
quests_json.Quest.warlock_5.step2: Does it really matter? We all know that you can't even read them. Leave them be.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_5.step3: I'll keep looking till I find something that I can read.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_6.step1: Grizzly, what do you make of these books from the scientific point of view?
quests_json.Quest.warlock_6.step2: I'd rather not say because I don't want to offend anyone.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_6.step3: Interesting. Now I'm even more curious to see this so-called witch.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_7.step1: Does anyone want to give up? We've been carrying those books around for too long. And they're not getting lighter.
quests_json.Quest.warlock_7.step2: We owe it to their owner to save her. Trust me, I've been there. It's not a nice feeling to be captured.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_1.step2: How come you keep on finding things?
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_1.step3: It's easy, my friend. I'm just always looking for food.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_2.step1: Do you have any idea what this is?
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_2.step2: No, I've never seen anything like it before.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_2.step3: Maybe you can taste it and tell us what it feels like.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_2.step4: I know that I've got a reputation but even I'm scared of eating something so unfamiliar.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_3.step1: I'm so glad that I didn't try and eat it. It started to glow!
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_3.step2: It would've been funny to watch your huge belly being lit up on the inside. An oversized human torch, if I may.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_4.step1: So, what should we do about it?
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_4.step2: Why are you asking me? I don't know.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_4.step3: Because you're an expert when it comes to trees.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_4.step4: Yes, when it comes to cutting them down. This one looks like it would be wasted on firewood.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_5.step1: It's getting bigger and bigger each time. When does it stop?
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_5.step2: I don't know but I bet you that it's not over yet.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_5.step3: Alright, but if it is you're cooking tonight.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_6.step1: I have an ingenious idea!  We should read about this plant in the book.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_6.step2: Great plan! Although there is one little problem. None of us can read.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_6.step3: That's right... How could I forget about it!
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_6.step4: Not so sharp for a genius, are you?
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_7.step1: Wow, look how beautiful it is. Only something good can come out of something as pretty.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_7.step2: Let's find out if you're right!
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_8.step2: No, these flowers aren't for eating.
quests_json.Quest.magicplant_8.step4: I think they're for granting wishes.
quests_json.Quest.troll_1.step1: It looks like your dream is coming true. How would you like a new instrument?
quests_json.Quest.troll_1.step2: I don't feel like taking someone else's axe. Let's find its actual owner.
quests_json.Quest.troll_2.step1: Maybe you will be more compliant and accept my offer of becoming this axe's new master?
quests_json.Quest.troll_2.step2: I am pretty happy with my hammer, thank you. Why do you want to get rid of it so much?
quests_json.Quest.troll_2.step3: I don't want to starve to death while looking for the one who lost it.
quests_json.Quest.troll_2.step4: Don't worry. I'll help you to make things go faster.
quests_json.Quest.troll_3.step1: Our team is getting bigger. How are you going to feel when you're not the only one who knows his way around sharp tools?
quests_json.Quest.troll_3.step2: I'll feel great. There will finally be someone to talk to rather than you.
quests_json.Quest.troll_4.step1: It's important to be prepared. We don't know if it's a trap or not. Maybe someone is playing with us.
quests_json.Quest.troll_4.step2: I don't sense any dark magic surrounding this axe. I have a reason to believe that we're on the right path.
quests_json.Quest.troll_4.step3: I hope so but let's keep an eye on each other anyway.
quests_json.Quest.troll_5.step1: So, how do you know the axe owner? I thought that archery lovers do not hobnob with others.
quests_json.Quest.troll_5.step2: And yet, here I am, talking to you.
quests_json.Quest.troll_5.step4: He is a great hunter. If anyone can help you catch some food for dinner, it's him.
quests_json.Quest.troll_6.step1: So, how do you know the axe owner? I thought that archery lovers do not hobnob with others.
quests_json.Quest.troll_6.step2: And yet, here I am, talking to you.
quests_json.Quest.troll_6.step4: He is a great hunter. If anyone can help you catch some food for dinner, it's him.
quests_json.Quest.troll_7.step1: Look how fancy these axes are! Are you sure you don't want to take one? Who needs two axes?
quests_json.Quest.troll_7.step2: Someone who is strong enough to hold both of them.
quests_json.Quest.troll_8.step1: I was always wondering, your majesty, what is the weapon of your choice? Could it be an axe by any chance?
quests_json.Quest.troll_8.step2: A wise king will do everything in his power to avoid the battle. That's why I always have to keep my brain sharper than any sword.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_1.step1: I have the greatest of news, Grizzly! There is something that will make your stay here much better.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_1.step2: I'm sorry to disappoint you but you're confusing me with someone. I'm acquainted with some pandas but I'm not one myself.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_1.step3: Maybe you should learn from them. After all, normal food is always scarce when the Rider is around.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_2.step1: Why do we need this bamboo anyway if Grizzly is not going to eat it?
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_2.step2: Don't you remember? I can build anything out of anything. Let's find some more!
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_3.step1: Okay, I get that you don't find it tasty but will you consider living in a house made out of bamboo?
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_3.step2: Sure, why not. If it's big enough to accommodate me.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_3.step3: Did you hear that? Let's build a mansion for our friend!
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_4.step1: I've heard that some warriors use bamboo sticks as their weapons. Are you considering doing the same?
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_4.step2: It might be good for combat but I'm more into hunting. So the answer is no.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_4.step3: Got it. Maybe we can build you a shed big enough to store all of your bows and arrows.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_5.step1: I like what you're doing here. The more buildings we have the mightier our forces will be. How many more can you erect?
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_5.step2: It depends on how much more materials can we find.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_5.step3: Well, in that case, spare no expense but find what we need. Use all the help you need.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_6.step1: I can't believe I'm saying this but I need you to look for food.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_6.step2: And I can't believe my ears! I'm finally not the only one who is hungry all the time.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_6.step3: Yes, you still are. I was just hoping that you'll accidentally help me find more bamboo while searching for sustenance.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_7.step1: I don't get it. Why do we use bamboo for construction when we have stone, metal, and wood? Aren't they more resilient?
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_7.step2: Yes, they might be. But we don't have a choice. Our lands are spoiled with different kinds of creatures that we have to cut down.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_7.step3: And it would be a waste not to use what's left of them. Everything is valuable when rebuilding our kingdom.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_8.step1: I had no idea that you can erect a building so big and massive using... bamboo.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_8.step2: Well, my friend, when you have enough of something and you know how to use it miracles do happen. Wait until you see the next one!
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_10.step1: You weren't lying. This is amazing. I might reconsider relocating here from my current living quarters.
quests_json.Quest.bamboo_10.step2: I wouldn't advise you to live in a house that can theoretically be eaten. You might not be a panda but your appetite is unpredictable.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_1.step1: Remember you told me that you can build anything out of anything?
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_1.step2: Of course. I don't use words lightly like some other members of our crew.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_1.step3: Then I have a challenge for you if you choose to accept it!
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_2.step1: Do you still think that you're up for the task?
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_2.step2: I am. And I'll finish faster if you stop talking and start helping me collect more materials.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_3.step1: Doesn't it look fragile to you?
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_3.step2: Do not underestimate crystals. The more buildings we made using them the safer our Kingdom is going to be.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_4.step1: What is it that you're building, guys?
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_4.step2: Gingerbeard is desperately trying to prove that he doesn't waste his words.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_4.step3: I'm not trying to prove it. I am actually doing it.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_5.step1: This looks pretty. Although I would never think that you made it.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_5.step3: I don't mean to be rude but you don't look like someone capable of crafting sophisticated buildings like that.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_6.step1: Okay, you've got yourself a deal. I am going to help you under one condition...
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_6.step2: I'm doing pretty good on my own. I don't think that I need your help.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_6.step3: It's too late now. I am helping you anyway in exchange for one of these villas. Emeralda seems to like them and I... Hm. I really like her.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_7.step1: Did you tell anyone else about your secret?
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_7.step2: No! And if you do I will... I will eat your saw!
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_7.step3: Don't worry, it's safe with me. Actually, I find it very romantic. Let's build a real castle for her!
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_8.step1: Hey, Grizzly, can you give us a hand? We tried to bite off more than we could chew.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_8.step2: Don't say that you want me to carry materials for you again! I'm a strong and independent bear but I do have feelings too, you know.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_8.step3: Of course. And we wouldn't want to hurt them. We're having a tea party with honey and jam afterward and you're invited!
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_8.step4: Why didn't you start with that?! What and where do you need me to carry?
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_9.step1: So, what are you going to do? Just give her the keys and say "It's your castle now, enjoy"?
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_9.step2: I didn't think it through. I'm not good with words, you know that better than anyone.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_9.step3: Maybe we should ask the King? It's his job to be eloquent.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_9.step4: I'm not ready to share my darkest secret with two people in one day. I'll wing it!
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_11.step1: How do you like this castle?
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_11.step2: It's beautiful. Gingerbeard did a great job.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_11.step3: I've helped him, actually. He said that he couldn't do it without me.
quests_json.Quest.sapphire_11.step4: Really? Well, I hope you realize that I was being sarcastic when calling it pretty. My favorite color is green, not purple. Better luck next time.
quests_json.Quest.knight_1.step1: Your Majesty! Finally, something that deserves your attention.
quests_json.Quest.knight_1.step2: Thank you kindly but I'm perfectly happy with my sword as it is. Although I'm curious to see where this peculiar item is going to bring us.
quests_json.Quest.knight_2.step1: How are you feeling about another weapon in our collection? I remember when I first found your ax. It got me scared.
quests_json.Quest.knight_2.step2: Fangtooth is scared of nothing. And he will protect his scared friends.
quests_json.Quest.knight_2.step3: Wow, when did we manage to become friends?
quests_json.Quest.knight_2.step4: You're still here. That makes you a friend of Fangtooth.
quests_json.Quest.knight_3.step1: Grizzly, you're a bear of science, aren't you?
quests_json.Quest.knight_3.step2: Indeed I am. What is your point?
quests_json.Quest.knight_3.step3: Do you happen to know what's more resilient, a sword or a hammer?
quests_json.Quest.knight_3.step4: A usual sword would beat your normal hammer. But my hammer is beyond normal. And it will beat any sword, even an extraordinary one.
quests_json.Quest.knight_4.step2: Yes. Totally. I'm great. I'm fine. Why do you ask?
quests_json.Quest.knight_4.step3: Another potential member of our team is on the way. What if he likes Emeralda too...
quests_json.Quest.knight_4.step4: Actually, it doesn't bother me at all. As long as we don't stumble on a crossbow I have nothing to worry about.
quests_json.Quest.knight_5.step2: Yes. Totally. I'm great. I'm fine. Why do you ask?
quests_json.Quest.knight_5.step3: Another potential member of our team is on the way. What if he likes Emeralda too...
quests_json.Quest.knight_5.step4: Actually, it doesn't bother me at all. As long as we don't stumble on a crossbow I have nothing to worry about.
quests_json.Quest.knight_6.step1: Can you say anything about this sword just by looking at it?
quests_json.Quest.knight_6.step2: I'm not a psychic, you know. Why are you so curious anyway?
quests_json.Quest.knight_6.step3: No reason. I just want to be prepared for anything.
quests_json.Quest.knight_7.step1: Do you think I should get a weapon too?
quests_json.Quest.knight_7.step2: I don't even think that you can use one properly.
quests_json.Quest.knight_7.step3: That is so mean of you. I can handle this sword even better than its current owner!
quests_json.Quest.knight_7.step4: We'll see about that very soon, won't we?
quests_json.Quest.knight_8.step1: You really got me thinking about this sword so I investigated it. Turns out it's made out of dragon steel.
quests_json.Quest.knight_8.step2: Is it a good or a bad thing?
quests_json.Quest.knight_8.step3: It means that it will beat my hammer 10 times out of 10...
quests_json.Quest.knight_9.step1: Now I know enough about my future nemesis to compete with him!
quests_json.Quest.knight_9.step2: Take it easy, there is still chance that you and him are going to be best of friends.
quests_json.Quest.knight_9.step3: Don't worry, Gingerbeard, we have so much history. I'll never forget about you!
quests_json.Quest.woodgenerator_1.step1: Remember you told me that your saw is the fastest one in the kingdom?
quests_json.Quest.woodgenerator_1.step2: Of course, I meant every word.
quests_json.Quest.woodgenerator_1.step3: I will believe you when I see you taking care of this giant ent and then move on to the next one. Even bigger one...
quests_json.Quest.woodgenerator_2.step2: You know what they say. Once – coincidence. Twice – evidence.
quests_json.Quest.woodgenerator_2.step3: I see what you did there. Let's take on this next ent together as a team!
quests_json.Quest.woodgenerator_2.step4: I thought you would never ask!
quests_json.Quest.fruitshop_0.step1: Are you prepared to be blown away?
quests_json.Quest.fruitshop_0.step2: What is it? You've found something to eat? For the millionth time.
quests_json.Quest.fruitshop_0.step3: Better! I don't have to look for food no more. Maybe there is something there for you too.
quests_json.Quest.resourceshop_0.step1: I need a little help. Do you mind?
quests_json.Quest.resourceshop_0.step2: You never ask for help. It seems suspicious. And is probably very tiring.
quests_json.Quest.resourceshop_0.step3: Yes indeed it is. But the more hands we have, the faster we can rebuild the Kingdom using supplies from this store.
quests_json.Quest.discountshop_0.step2: They've got everything we might need for restoring our Kingdom. I personally know the owner. He is a great wizard.
quests_json.Quest.discountshop_0.step3: I know nothing about magic but restoring the Kingdom sounds just like what we're trying to do.
quests_json.Quest.kraken_0.step1: I didn't know that there were giant squids in our waters.
quests_json.Quest.kraken_0.step2: I bet you also didn't know that we can use the keys to fight evil spirits. Let me show you how it's done!
quests_json.Quest.hunter_1.step1: Do you know what you’re lacking? Perspective. How about some bird’s eye view?
quests_json.Quest.hunter_1.step2: Are you okay? I think I’ve told you to stop eating everything you see.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_1.step3: It’s not about what I’ve eaten. It’s about what I’ve found. Let’s look for more!
quests_json.Quest.hunter_2.step2: Spectacular, your highness. If everything goes according to the plan, our team will have a new recruit in no time.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_2.step3: Glad to hear that. Keep up the good work and let me know if you need any help.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_3.step1: Hey, Grizzly, how will you feel when you're not the only beast around anymore?
quests_json.Quest.hunter_3.step2: You know me. I am very animal friendly. So animal friendly, in fact, that I’ll help you find the rest!
quests_json.Quest.hunter_4.step1: Do you think we need someone else’s help?
quests_json.Quest.hunter_4.step2: We’ve got a big enough squad to do it on our own.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_4.step3: Well, in that case, I am sorry. I think I’ve accidentally invited Mergelot to join us.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_5.step1: I’ve heard that you’re looking for a new hero?
quests_json.Quest.hunter_5.step2: Yes. We don’t know who it might be but we dying to know.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_5.step3: Why do you need a new hero anyway? You’ve got me now.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_5.step4: The more great teammates we have, the faster we can rebuild the kingdom.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_6.step1: Why did you decide to help us? I thought you preferred to work alone.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_6.step2: I do. But you know perfectly well where it got me. If it weren’t for you, I would forever remain in oblivion.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_6.step3: Yeah, I guess, we did save you. Does it make you forever in our debt?
quests_json.Quest.hunter_6.step4: I’m not sure about eternity but you can ask me for anything you want and I will do it.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_7.step1: Do you remember our conversation about you being so grateful that you would do anything for me?
quests_json.Quest.hunter_7.step2: Yes, of course. Do you have something in mind?
quests_json.Quest.hunter_7.step3: There is a girl I kind of like and I would appreciate it if you could give me a chance to win her over.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_7.step4: No need to worry, my friend. There is nothing I enjoy more than being a bachelor. If anything, I can give you advice on how to make her fall in love with you.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_7.step5: That would be better than the most lavish dinner I could ever imagine! Let’s do this right after finding ourselves a new hero.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_8.step1: Are you excited to meet another hero?
quests_json.Quest.hunter_8.step2: As long as she brings something new to the table.
quests_json.Quest.hunter_8.step3: You and your food innuendos... Let’s get to work!
quests_json.Quest.snow_1.step1: Since our team is getting bigger we’ve decided to build another castle. Would you like to help us?
quests_json.Quest.snow_1.step2: Every construction crew needs a supervisor. Thank you for the offer, I’ll gladly accept it!
quests_json.Quest.snow_2.step2: It might’ve been better if you were actually helping us instead of just sitting there…
quests_json.Quest.snow_2.step3: I’m sorry but I can’t work when I’m hungry.
quests_json.Quest.snow_2.step4: But you’re hungry all the time.
quests_json.Quest.snow_3.step1: Are you building an ice castle? I’ve always wondered what it would be like to live in one.
quests_json.Quest.snow_3.step2: Yes but it’s taking us too long because…
quests_json.Quest.snow_3.step3: Because we don’t have enough materials! Come on, guys, let’s go and get some more.
quests_json.Quest.snow_4.step2: You know how things with me and Emeralda are complicated. I’ll do anything to make them better.
quests_json.Quest.snow_4.step3: Even work on an empty stomach?
quests_json.Quest.snow_4.step4: I told you that she is special.
quests_json.Quest.snow_5.step1: So, what do I say to win Emeralda over?
quests_json.Quest.snow_5.step2: I just used to come galloping to the lady of my heart at the time and ask her if she needs a ride.
quests_json.Quest.snow_5.step3: But you’re a knight on a horse with a dragon steel sword. I’m a ranger on a hog with two horns.
quests_json.Quest.snow_5.step4: I guess I didn’t think it through… Don’t worry! We’ll come up with something.
quests_json.Quest.snow_6.step1: Do you remember me being from a long line of chemists?
quests_json.Quest.snow_6.step2: Of course, how could we forget? You wouldn’t let us.
quests_json.Quest.snow_6.step3: Well, it has finally paid off since I’ve found a way to make the ice solid even when exposed to heat.
quests_json.Quest.snow_6.step4: Great news! We’ll gladly find you more ice to experiment with.
quests_json.Quest.snow_7.step3: I guess it’s kind of freezing here.
quests_json.Quest.snow_7.step4: I just never stop working to keep my body warm. You should try it some time.
quests_json.Quest.snow_8.step1: I must say, Grizzly, your achievements as a chemist are astonishing.
quests_json.Quest.snow_8.step2: I appreciate it, your highness. I still need a couple more samples to perfect the formula, though.
quests_json.Quest.snow_8.step3: Say no more. We’re already on it!
quests_json.Quest.snow_9.step1: Do you have a favorite building? Since you were the one who erected all of them.
quests_json.Quest.snow_9.step2: It’s like having to pick your favorite child. Every each one of them is perfect in its own way.
quests_json.Quest.snow_11.step1: Congratulations are in order! The formula is stable and ready to use.
quests_json.Quest.snow_11.step2: Great job, Grizzly. I’m very proud of you and our team. With the citizens like this the Kingdom will be even stronger than before.
quests_json.Quest.crystal_1.step1: My prayers have been heard. Finally something to drink with my meals!
quests_json.Quest.crystal_1.step2: Don’t you dare drinking it, you fool. Don’t you know what it is?
quests_json.Quest.crystal_1.step3: You know me. I like to act because I don’t like to think.
quests_json.Quest.crystal_1.step4: Pack your things. We’re going on an adventure. Make sure to bring more of that liquid stuff with you.
quests_json.Quest.crystal_2.step2: We’re a looking for a magic scroll.
quests_json.Quest.crystal_2.step3: Why? You know I can’t read.
quests_json.Quest.crystal_2.step4: You don’t need to read anything. Just keep looking for those bottles.
quests_json.Quest.crystal_3.step1: Are you going to help me find this magic bottle?
quests_json.Quest.crystal_3.step2: I will attend you on your quest. Not to help though, but to make sure that you don’t try and taste their contents.
quests_json.Quest.crystal_use.step1: Great work, Hog Rider. Are you ready for some wisdom to be dropped?
quests_json.Quest.crystal_use.step3: The ancient inscription says that you can merge this liquid rainbow potion with any object.
quests_json.Quest.crystal_use.step4: I can put this bottle next to anything and it will work as if all of the objects were of the same kind?
quests_json.Quest.crystal_use.step5: Exactly. That’s a little thing I like to call Mergest Kingdom magic.
quests_json.Quest.lava_1.step1: Ouch! This stone is quite hot, I almost got toasted!
quests_json.Quest.lava_1.step2: You bet. It's better not to touch it with bare hands. It's a lava stone!
quests_json.Quest.lava_2.step1: Do you think you can build a house out of lava?
quests_json.Quest.lava_2.step2: I don't know, let's put these stones together and see what happens.
quests_json.Quest.lava_3.step1: Does it look like a building yet?
quests_json.Quest.lava_3.step2: Not at all. This could be anything but a building.
quests_json.Quest.lava_3.step3: We desperately need a proper tool. Grizzly, help us! You know your way around hot metal so you'll have no problem dealing with lava.
quests_json.Quest.lava_3.step4: Actually, I was planning on taking a little break...
quests_json.Quest.lava_4.step1: Looks like Grizzly has built himself a den...
quests_json.Quest.lava_4.step2: I think it's a huge fire turtle!
quests_json.Quest.lava_4.step3: Turtle? With a door instead of the head? We're definitely heading in the wrong direction...
quests_json.Quest.lava_4.step4: Let's grab a bite and try to make something more elegant out of it!
quests_json.Quest.lava_5.step1: Is this your idea of elegance?
quests_json.Quest.lava_5.step2: Well, at least it looks like a house, not a turtle.
quests_json.Quest.lava_5.step4: We want to build a house using these lava stones, but what we have so far is hardly tasteful...
quests_json.Quest.lava_5.step5: Have you tried cooling the stones with cold water?
quests_json.Quest.lava_6.step1: Why didn't we think about cooling the stones in the first place?! Look how gorgeous it is!
quests_json.Quest.lava_6.step2: Let's not stop there, I have an idea!
quests_json.Quest.lava_6.step4: Don't interrupt my train of thought. You'll see for yourself soon.
quests_json.Quest.lava_7.step2: I think this is one of my best works! Considering the material...
quests_json.Quest.lava_7.step3: How about another room with large windows?
quests_json.Quest.lava_7.step4: Sure, we deserve to have a great view of our Kingdom!
quests_json.Quest.lava_8.step1: All done! How do you like the view?
quests_json.Quest.lava_8.step2: What a cute pantry. Or is that the room with large windows I was talking to you about earlier?
quests_json.Quest.lava_8.step3: I think you hurt his feelings. Why so cruel?
quests_json.Quest.lava_8.step4: Everything is going according to plan. I know what he is capable of, but he needs the right push.
quests_json.Quest.lava_8.step5: I wish they taught that at the sorcery university.
quests_json.Quest.lava_9.step2: Help is always good even though I'm almost done here.
quests_json.Quest.lava_9.step4: I want to build a castle that no one in the Kingdom has ever seen before!
quests_json.Quest.lava_9.step6: In that case, help me and you will be the first one to see this masterpiece!
quests_json.Quest.lava_11.step1: Didn't you change your mind about helping me?
quests_json.Quest.lava_11.step2: Fangtooth doesn't know how to change mind.
quests_json.Quest.lava_11.step3: You have a lot to learn. I hope it doesn't apply to erecting buildings.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_1.step1: Do you mind taking a look at this test tube?
quests_json.Quest.centaur_1.step2: I need to know in advance what is it that you want to find out.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_1.step3: Any information is of value to us.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_1.step4: In that case, I need more objects to work with.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_2.step1: I beg you, be careful with that. All the items should be intact for the Enchantress to study. The King himself asked for that.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_2.step2: Don’t worry, I’m always careful. And even if it breaks, can’t she cast a restoration spell on it or something?
quests_json.Quest.centaur_2.step3: I don’t think that she would want to waste her magic on something as minor. So let’s just be extra cautious.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_3.step1: I’ve probably asked you this question a million times already. Why are we collecting all these utensils?
quests_json.Quest.centaur_3.step2: I would usually have an answer for you but this time it’s coming from the above. If you really want to know, it worth trying your luck with the King himself.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_3.step3: Alright, but first we need to find something else so I don’t embark on this mission empty-handed.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_4.step1: You wanted to speak with me?
quests_json.Quest.centaur_4.step2: Yes, sire. Why it’s so important for us to collect and study these peculiar objects?
quests_json.Quest.centaur_4.step3: I’m glad that it got your interest. I tell you what. Come back with a new item and I’ll reveal the plan to you.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_5.step1: Well done! Are you ready to hear the secret behind these objects?
quests_json.Quest.centaur_5.step2: Sure thing. My curiosity kept me looking even when I was extremely hungry.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_5.step3: Many years ago we had a royal orphanage for special kids. But the building was destroyed during the battle. I have a feeling that these utensils may belong to one of its former residents.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_5.step4: Thank you for sharing this with me, sire. I will not rest until we find their owner.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_6.step3: You work with such ferocity. I’ve never seen you like that before.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_6.step4: Let’s not waste time talking. We need to find the rest of the objects.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_7.step1: Excuse me, sire. I feel kind of bad keeping this information a secret from the team. Can I, please, tell them about the orphanage?
quests_json.Quest.centaur_7.step2: You’re probably right. It’s better to let everyone know what we’re fighting for.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_8.step1: So that’s what it’s all about. It explains a lot and it’s good to know that we’re all on the same page now.
quests_json.Quest.centaur_8.step2: Sorry for keeping you in the dark. I guess the king was just too worried about the mission so he didn’t want to jinx it.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_1.step1: I think we might be in trouble…
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_1.step4: Let’s try to be careful with it until we find out where it came from.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_2.step3: No more bombs, just harmless goggles.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_2.step4: These are supposed to protect your eyes when the bomb blows off, silly. Let’s keep looking.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_3.step1: How about now? How can this helmet possibly be related to the bomb?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_3.step2: It should protect your head from debris randomly flying around after the explosion.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_3.step3: Okay, you have a point. Let’s keep looking.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_4.step1: Things just got way more serious. We can’t keep it a secret anymore. Whom should we tell about our findings?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_4.step2: There is only one member of our team who is able to fully appreciate the magnitude of the situation. Let’s hear what he has to say!
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_5.step1: Hey, Grizzly! I bet you’re longing for a real challenge. We’ve got something for you.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_5.step2: If it’s again related to moving heavy objects around I think I will pass.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_5.step3: It’s more about blowing up heavy objects so you don’t have to move them around. Are you in?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_6.step1: Where did you find this stuff, guys? It’s a pretty dangerous substance. You were right to come to me.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_6.step2: It was lying all over the Kingdom. Do you think someone mined us?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_6.step3: Looks more like someone very sloppy was casually carrying some dynamite around when it fell out of pocket.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_7.step1: Look, Grizzly, you were right. We found our suspect.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_7.step2: Let’s follow him and see where he gets us.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_8.step1: There’re two of them! Come on, guys, it’s our cue. Let’s catch them.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_8.step2: It’s too early. I’m pretty sure they’re up to something. We need to wait and see if it’s something good or bad.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_9.step1: How much longer should we wait? They are getting more and more explosives.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_9.step2: I always knew that you’re impatient but I thought it was only related to food.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_9.step3: If they blow out the canteen there will be no food to worry about!
quests_json.Quest.sand_1.step1: You know how I’m spending all of my free time in the laboratory?
quests_json.Quest.sand_1.step2: Yes, I do more than anyone. Because things are heavier without you.
quests_json.Quest.sand_1.step3: Well, I was able to discover the deposit of sand. It’s full of bricks like this. We can use them to build something. And the best part is… I’ll help you carry!
quests_json.Quest.sand_1.step4: Now we’re talking! Let me get Gingerbeard!
quests_json.Quest.sand_2.step1: What was so important that you had to wake me up? I was having a most wonderful dream where I had two saws…
quests_json.Quest.sand_2.step2: You should thank me, then. I’m giving you an opportunity to use the one you actually have. But first, we need to collect the materials.
quests_json.Quest.sand_3.step1: It already looks good, don’t you think?
quests_json.Quest.sand_3.step2: These are just a few blocks put together…
quests_json.Quest.sand_3.step3: Yes, but it’s the first step to something great.
quests_json.Quest.sand_3.step4: Technically, it’s a third step but whatever. I’m curious to know when did you manage to become so patient?
quests_json.Quest.sand_4.step1: If we build more huts like this, imagine how much food you’ll be able to store…
quests_json.Quest.sand_4.step2: I’m not that interested in sustenance anymore. After all, it’s just an ephemeral pleasure.
quests_json.Quest.sand_4.step3: I don’t know what scares me more, the fact that you’re saying no to food or that you know the word "ephemeral".
quests_json.Quest.sand_5.step1: What is it with you not wanting to eat anything that comes into your view?
quests_json.Quest.sand_5.step2: Okay, I’ll tell you, but first, we need to build more of these stalls.
quests_json.Quest.sand_6.step1: Alright, we are ready to hear the explanation.
quests_json.Quest.sand_6.step2: Sure, but first, we need to build more--
quests_json.Quest.sand_6.step3: Nice try, buddy. It won’t work this time. Tell us!
quests_json.Quest.sand_7.step1: Is everything okay? Why would you do that?
quests_json.Quest.sand_7.step2: Yeah, why? Did Emeralda agree to go out on a date with you and you’re just worried that you will go broke paying for your standard 17 courses? If that’s the case, I can lend you some gold…
quests_json.Quest.sand_7.step3: Thank you, Gingerbeard. I appreciate it. But let’s focus on doing our job. Those cottages won’t build themselves.
quests_json.Quest.sand_8.step1: I think I’m going to speak for everyone here. I refuse to erect any more manors until you spill all the beans.
quests_json.Quest.sand_8.step2: Okay, here we go… You were right when you said I’m not doing it for myself…
quests_json.Quest.sand_8.step3: I knew that it had something to do with Emeralda! Who is a genius now, Grizzly?
quests_json.Quest.sand_8.step4: I’m doing it for my hog.
quests_json.Quest.sand_9.step1: So, you’re depriving yourself of the pleasure of food for your hog’s sake?
quests_json.Quest.sand_9.step2: He is not getting any younger, you know. And I’m getting heavier. I don’t want him to suffer anymore.
quests_json.Quest.sand_9.step3: Actually, there might be another solution for that. You go and finish building more mansions, and I will check something.
quests_json.Quest.sand_11.step1: Burn a lot of calories while building a giant pyramid… Is that really your solution?
quests_json.Quest.sand_11.step2: No, it’s just something for you to do while I’m working on the magic elixir. It will be your reward for a job well done.
quests_json.Quest.asia_1.step1: Where did you find this? And why? We have enough buildings made of stone. You made them, remember?
quests_json.Quest.asia_1.step2: How could I forget… But this is not an ordinary stone. Help me find more of this and I’ll tell you more.
quests_json.Quest.asia_1.step3: Not again… Why does this always work on me? Let’s keep looking!
quests_json.Quest.asia_2.step1: Here is a bunch of stones for you. Can I know more about them now? Please!
quests_json.Quest.asia_2.step2: Okay-okay. You did a good job. You deserve to know that it’s not stone, it’s terracotta.
quests_json.Quest.asia_3.step1: Now we have enough resources to erect the terracotta castle. We start from the foundation and build our way up.
quests_json.Quest.asia_3.step2: How do you come up with this stuff? First some terracotta, now terracotta castle…
quests_json.Quest.asia_3.step3: I don’t know what rock you live under but everyone in the kingdom knows this legend.
quests_json.Quest.asia_3.step4: Yeah? I bet I can find someone else on our team who has never heard about it before!
quests_json.Quest.asia_4.step1: Hey, Fangtooth! Do you know what this is?
quests_json.Quest.asia_4.step3: Damn it, Fangtooth. You were my only hope.
quests_json.Quest.asia_5.step2: No… You were right. I’m the most ignorant member of our team.
quests_json.Quest.asia_5.step3: Don’t be so harsh on yourself. Help me build more of these huts so we could later turn them into something greater.
quests_json.Quest.asia_5.step4: Like the castle? Okay, I’m in!
quests_json.Quest.asia_6.step1: So, what’s the deal with the terracotta?
quests_json.Quest.asia_6.step2: There was a great emperor on one of the islands in the Seventh Realm. He was very powerful but vain. So he decided to build the biggest castle for himself.
quests_json.Quest.asia_6.step4: Next, he helped me build more of these tiny houses…
quests_json.Quest.asia_7.step1: I’m serious, what happened to the king?
quests_json.Quest.asia_7.step2: He became paranoid. He locked himself in the castle and alienated all of his people. He was left there alone. Until he was turned into a terracotta statue sitting on his throne.
quests_json.Quest.asia_7.step3: Does this look anything like his castle?
quests_json.Quest.asia_8.step1: I’m sorry. But why are we trying to rebuild this castle? I don’t want to turn into a statue.
quests_json.Quest.asia_8.step2: The legend says that if the castle is rebuilt to serve people its doors will be always open for ones who seek shelter. So we’re kind of doing a good thing here.
quests_json.Quest.asia_9.step1: This already looks like a castle, if you ask me.
quests_json.Quest.asia_9.step2: Yes, it’s beautiful and big, but the castle is even larger and prettier. So let’s keep looking!
quests_json.Quest.asia_11.step1: Okay, now it has to be the castle. The third time's the charm!
quests_json.Quest.asia_11.step2: Technically, it’s what’s left of the castle. But sure, you’re right.
quests_json.Quest.asia_11.step3: That’s great news because I can’t wait to start rebuilding it!
quests_json.Quest.shark_1.step1: Did you lose your fang, Fangtooth?
quests_json.Quest.shark_2.step1: Hey, Grizzly! Fangtooth picked up a scent that led us to this compass. You’re an expert of all water-related things so, naturally, we came to you looking for help.
quests_json.Quest.shark_2.step2: I will definitely need more than just a compass to conduct my research. Let’s see what else we can find!
quests_json.Quest.shark_3.step1: I hope this spotting scope will help you see things clearer.
quests_json.Quest.shark_3.step2: Yes, thank you. Let me take a closer look at these corals and study their origin while you keep searching for more.
quests_json.Quest.shark_4.step1: Things begin to look pretty dangerous…
quests_json.Quest.shark_4.step2: This musket is not loaded but I agree. It’s time to reach out to someone who has an eye for trouble.
quests_json.Quest.shark_5.step2: Not exactly. We’re giving you a chance to become a part of the team.
quests_json.Quest.shark_5.step3: Help us find and neutralize the owner of these disturbing objects and we might consider your candidacy for recruitment.
quests_json.Quest.shark_6.step1: Before we begin, let me share some findings. These are no ordinary corals. They cover any object placed on with a layer of armor making it impenetrable to water.
quests_json.Quest.shark_6.step2: Sounds like a very advanced technology… Or even some witchery!
quests_json.Quest.shark_6.step3: Whatever this is, we must find and stop its owner before it’s too late.
quests_json.Quest.shark_7.step1: We found this flag and it can only mean one thing.
quests_json.Quest.shark_7.step2: We are dealing with a member of the pirate guild. And there is only one way to find him.
quests_json.Quest.shark_8.step2: We need to find something valuable and place it into the local waters while securing the perimeter.
quests_json.Quest.shark_8.step3: This should lure him into our trap and get himself caught.
quests_json.Quest.shark_8.step4: Alright, sounds solid. But whatever happens, no explosives!
quests_json.Quest.shark_9.step1: This seems valuable enough to attract our pirate.
quests_json.Quest.shark_9.step2: We will use it as a centerpiece of our master plan.
quests_json.Quest.shark_9.step3: Very well then. It’s time to go fishing!
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_1.step1: Hey, Fangtooth, did you lose anything?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_1.step3: Well, in that case, help us find more of these tusks.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_2.step1: I had no idea that tusk deposits exist.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_2.step2: There are many things you have no idea about.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_2.step4: For your information, tusks serve as a protection to any structure they are used to build. Here, let me demonstrate!
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_3.step1: Before we start any construction with the tusks, we need to charge them with some magic.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_3.step2: Can’t we just do the same with everything? Let’s make our wood magical too.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_3.step3: Only the tusks have the capacity to do that. Let me get my spellbook and we can begin.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_4.step1: So, even a simple tusk tent like this can be as durable as a stone fortress?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_4.step2: As a matter of fact, yes. It can be and it is. And speaking of fortresses, nothing compares to a tusk fort.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_4.step3: And this is our end goal. To erect the most durable structure the realm has ever seen.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_5.step1: No offense, but if we want to take on such an ambitious project mere magic won’t do. We also need expertise.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_5.step3: Let’s summon Grizzly from his hibernation to make sure that the building itself is worth casting your spells on.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_6.step1: So, what’s all this fuss about? I was dreaming such a great dream…
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_6.step2: Yes, you were swimming in a pond of raspberry honey, we get it. But we have something real at stake.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_6.step3: Help us design the best fortress and Enchantress will make your dream come true.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_7.step1: Well, guys, what do you have so far?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_7.step2: We’ve been collecting tusks so that we have enough of them for our final project.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_7.step3: We have a lot of work ahead of us but this is what we do best. Let’s turn it into the strongest hold the world has ever seen!
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_8.step1: We have a tiny little hiccup a size of a mammoth here…
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_8.step3: I think we are running out of tusks and I am not sure that there are enough left on the island.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_8.step4: Don’t worry just yet. I think I might know the way out.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_9.step1: The legend says that you can smuggle anything from anywhere. Do you think you can live up to it?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_9.step2: This is what I do. The question is, what’s in it for me?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_9.step3: Nothing too fancy. Just your own fleet and a chance to sail under the most respected flag in the realm.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_10.step1: Consider the problem with the tusk supply resolved. Can you still deliver on your end?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_10.step2: Absolutely, your highness. As promised, the most impenetrable fortress is on its way.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_12.step1: I thought you said that there is nothing more durable than tusks…
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_12.step3: How do you explain this then?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_12.step4: Let this serve as a reminder to us that a tusk fort construction is an unforgiving process.
quests_json.Quest.fish_1.step1: I stumbled upon this intricate mechanical key in the castle's old storage room. Quite fascinating, isn't it?
quests_json.Quest.fish_1.step2: Aye, it reminds me of something from my past. Let's keep an eye out for more clues.
quests_json.Quest.fish_2.step1: Another fascinating discovery coming our way. Any thoughts on this mysterious clockwork?
quests_json.Quest.fish_2.step2: This clockwork looks familiar. It might be related to my old companion, Cyber Fin. We should investigate further.
quests_json.Quest.fish_3.step1: Who is Cyber Fin and could these goggles be hers?
quests_json.Quest.fish_3.step2: No doubt about it, they're hers. They allowed her to see clearly in the darkest depths. She once saved me from a giant fish I didn't even see coming. I owe it to Cyber Fin to find the rest of her belongings and uncover the truth.
quests_json.Quest.fish_3.step3: Since you're a part of our team now, we'll help you on that journey. Come on, let's continue our search!
quests_json.Quest.fish_4.step1: Check out this high-tech water gun! It looks like it could pack a powerful punch.
quests_json.Quest.fish_4.step2: Aye, that's Cyber Fin's weapon of choice. She could knock down enemies with the force of a tidal wave using that thing. We're definitely on the right track. Let's keep moving forward!
quests_json.Quest.fish_5.step1: Fascinating! This gauntlet seems to harness the power of water. I've never seen anything quite like it.
quests_json.Quest.fish_5.step2: That's Cyber Fin's Aqua Gauntlet. With it, she could control water like a puppeteer.
quests_json.Quest.fish_5.step3: Let's hope she doesn't use it against us!
quests_json.Quest.fish_6.step1: Look what I found! Some peculiar binoculars with a unique design.
quests_json.Quest.fish_6.step2: Aye, those be Cyber Fin's trusty binoculars. They helped her spot danger and treasures from great distances. It's a sign, me hearties! We're on the right track.
quests_json.Quest.fish_6.step3: Will she make us rich when we find her?
quests_json.Quest.fish_6.step4: Either that or we will find ourselves very wet and very poor.
quests_json.Quest.fish_7.step1: I came across this toolbag filled with all sorts of gadgets and gizmos. Think it's got anything to do with Cyber Fin?
quests_json.Quest.fish_7.step2: Arr, that be her Toolbag of Tricks! She used those gadgets to navigate, repair, and sometimes escape sticky situations. Finding it means we're closin' in, me mateys.
quests_json.Quest.fish_7.step3: Let's keep up the pace and see where these discoveries lead us!
quests_json.Quest.fish_8.step1: I discovered this highly advanced measuring device. It seems to be capable of analyzing various environmental conditions.
quests_json.Quest.fish_8.step2: Aye, that be Cyber Fin's anything-meter. She used it to collect data on the ocean's depths, currents, and even the weather above. We must be gettin' close, me hearties.
quests_json.Quest.fish_8.step3: So, all these items are leading us to Cyber Fin. Let's press on and see what awaits us at the end of this trail.
quests_json.Quest.fish_9.step1: I came across this unusual helmet. It appears to be designed for underwater exploration.
quests_json.Quest.fish_9.step2: Arr, that be the helmet Cyber Fin provided for her human allies! It allowed them to breathe underwater and communicate with her, creating a seamless partnership during missions.
quests_json.Quest.fish_9.step3: Our search is almost complete. Let's find the last item and uncover the truth about Cyber Fin.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_1.step1: Look at this strange relic, Grizzly. Found it buried deep in our kingdom's woods. It feels almost... otherworldly.Intriguing... Its form is foreign, yet familiar. The combination of arcane symbols and mechanical components suggest it's not just a simple piece of equipment. This, my liege, is a part of something much greater. I believe this is a piece of the legendary Star Chariot!
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_1.step2: The Star Chariot, you say? That old legend about our ancestors trying to build a ship to sail across the stars? I thought it was just a fairy tale.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_1.step3: Most legends hold a grain of truth, Gingerbeard. This discovery may just be the beginning of a grand quest. We'll need everyone's help to gather the remaining parts scattered throughout the kingdom. Let the celestial journey begin!
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_2.step1: Look what I've dug up while on the hunt for my lunch. It's small, round, and metallic. Could it be another piece of the Star Chariot?
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_2.step2: Indeed, Hog Rider. I believe it's the celestial pod. Legend says it's a part of the Star Chariot, used for shorter voyages across the celestial expanse.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_2.step3: Imagine what it'd be like to ride across the stars in this pod. There's so much more to explore beyond our kingdom.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_2.step4: Yes, our ancestors were far more adventurous than we thought. Let's continue our search.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_3.step1: Look at this, a medium pod, larger and more intricate. It could be the main body of the celestial chariot.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_3.step2: Aye, Grizzly, seems like we're on the right path! This looks fit for a long journey, perhaps even through the stars.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_3.step3: You're on the right track. But remember, the celestial chariot isn't something to be taken lightly. Or so I've heard.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_3.step4: Wait, CyberFin, what do you know about the celestial chariot?
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_3.step5: That's a story for another time. Let's focus on the task at hand.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_4.step1: This, my friends, is a large pod. The celestial chariot is nearing completion.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_4.step2: Such a grand structure. It's clear this chariot was designed to carry the hopes and dreams of its riders.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_4.step3: If what CyberFin said is true, then this isn't just a chariot. It's our ticket to the stars.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_4.step5: Only time will tell, Sabretooth. Only time will tell...
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_5.step1: Oh my, look at this! A small station, certainly part of our celestial chariot.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_5.step2: It seems to be designed to exist separate from the main chariot. Fascinating...
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_5.step3: Indeed. This must be a piece of the puzzle. Keep looking, team. Every item brings us closer to our goal.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_5.step4: Then, let's not waste time. The stars are waiting!
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_5.step5: Sabretooth not understand... But Sabretooth help!
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_6.step1: This larger station is impressive. It's clear that this object was crafted with extraordinary skill and knowledge.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_6.step2: And it bears the same markings. I believe we are indeed assembling a celestial chariot.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_6.step3: You're catching on. Still think you can handle what comes next?
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_6.step4: If it's a challenge, we'll face it! Bring it on, CyberFin.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_6.step5: Good. Because there's more to find, and not a moment to lose.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_7.step1: Whoa! This station, it's... it's about to fly off! That's some next-level wizardry right there.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_7.step2: It's not wizardry, it's celestial engineering. This could truly be a contraption from the legends.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_7.step3: I see I'm not the only one with a grasp on advanced technology. We're closer to the truth, but not there yet. Keep going.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_8.step1: Look at this! It’s more than a station. It's a vessel, designed to travel...beyond.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_8.step2: Could it be...meant for the stars?
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_8.step3: Why stop at stars? It's starbound, after all. Designed to explore the unknown, to seek out new territories.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_8.step4: This is exciting and terrifying at the same time. We're not just dealing with the earthly here, but the celestial.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_8.step5: Indeed, Alvin. My creator spoke of such artifacts. Tools of an ancient civilization, capable of traversing the stars. Seems like we've stumbled upon their legacy.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_9.step1: We're moving up in the world, quite literally! This isn't just a vessel anymore, it's an Orbit Ascender.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_9.step2: Orbit Ascender? Does this mean we're going...
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_9.step3: Into space. Yes, Gingerbeard. But remember, this is just a model. The real one must be enormous.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_9.step4: You're right, Alvin. It's built to withstand the vacuum of space and the gravitational forces of ascension. Quite an incredible piece of engineering. The ancients were not only wise, they were also incredibly advanced.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_9.step5: It's becoming clear now. This isn't just about merging objects. This is about merging worlds, our world with the rest of the universe. I wonder what we'll discover next.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_10.step1: Solar Sail - an eco-friendly way to traverse the cosmos.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_10.step2: Indeed. It uses sunlight pressure to propel forward.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_10.step3: I wonder what space food tastes like...
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_10.step4: You might soon find out, but remember, the universe holds many unknowns.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step1: Look at this! It appears to be the body of the Celestial Chariot. It's severely damaged though.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step2: Aye, it's in rough shape. But we've got parts from those smaller vessels we found earlier. Might be just the ticket to get this old bird flying again.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step3: An excellent idea, Gingerbeard. We shall bring back the glory of this ancient marvel with our hands, our sweat.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step4: A daunting task indeed. But if we succeed, it will be a testament to our resilience and the ingenuity of our ancestors.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step5: We've got this team. Let's breathe life into this celestial beast.
quests_json.Quest.panda_1.step1: Interesting... this flower isn't indigenous to our kingdom.
quests_json.Quest.panda_1.step2: Hog Rider, Gingerbeard, do you recognize it?
quests_json.Quest.panda_1.step3: Can't say I've eaten anything like it before.
quests_json.Quest.panda_1.step4: This isn't for eating. This flower is an emblem of Luna Bamboo, a wise panda from my realm. Her wisdom might help us solve the riddle of my capture.
quests_json.Quest.panda_1.step5: A wise panda, you say? Intriguing. I suppose we must find out more about this Luna Bamboo.
quests_json.Quest.panda_2.step1: Hmm, doesn't look like a regular comb. Pretty fancy, I'd say.
quests_json.Quest.panda_2.step2: Indeed, it's not just a comb. This type of ornamentation suggests it belongs to someone of high status.
quests_json.Quest.panda_2.step3: Yes, this comb is one of Luna Bamboo's personal items. She was much more than just a panda, she was a sage. Her advice and wisdom were sought by many.
quests_json.Quest.panda_2.step4: A panda sage... How fascinating. The more I learn about Luna Bamboo, the more curious I become.
quests_json.Quest.panda_3.step1: A perfume bottle? We find the most peculiar things, don't we?
quests_json.Quest.panda_3.step2: Hah! Maybe we'll finally get Grizzly Bearington to smell a bit more... pleasant.
quests_json.Quest.panda_3.step3: That's uncalled for, Hog Rider! Though, this fragrance... It's captivating, unique. Luna Bamboo's?
quests_json.Quest.panda_3.step4: Indeed, Grizzly. Luna's scent was said to be as enchanting as her wisdom. It seems her presence lingers even in her absence.
quests_json.Quest.panda_4.step1: A hand fan? Interesting! Who would need to cool off in this breezy kingdom?
quests_json.Quest.panda_4.step2: Perhaps our dear friend, Grizzly? He seems to be getting all warm and fuzzy when Luna Bamboo is mentioned!
quests_json.Quest.panda_4.step3: I'm simply intrigued by her wisdom and knowledge, nothing more!
quests_json.Quest.panda_4.step4: Indeed, Grizzly. Your flushed face surely speaks of your... academic interest in Luna.
quests_json.Quest.panda_5.step1: What a splendid piece, it's a Nephrite necklace. These were believed to enhance spiritual power and wisdom in the ancient tales.
quests_json.Quest.panda_5.step2: Indeed, Enchantress. This could have been Luna Bamboo's source of wisdom and inner strength. Nephrite is a highly valued gem in her homeland.
quests_json.Quest.panda_5.step3: This piece could tell us more about Luna than we could've ever imagined. Let's not delay, we must continue our quest.
quests_json.Quest.panda_6.step1: Look at this, a parchment! It's an ancient scroll. Can't make heads or tails of the characters, though.
quests_json.Quest.panda_6.step2: These are ancient symbols, the precursor to the language we use today. Luna must have been knowledgeable to understand these.
quests_json.Quest.panda_6.step3: I wish I could understand this as she did. It might hold vital clues. Let's keep this safe. We're getting closer to understanding Luna Bamboo's story.
quests_json.Quest.panda_7.step1: These are Geta! Luna must have a certain appreciation for traditional attire.
quests_json.Quest.panda_7.step2: She seems to have an interesting style. I must say, it's quite... unique.
quests_json.Quest.panda_7.step3: Grizzly, you're not thinking of switching your boots for these, are you?
quests_json.Quest.panda_7.step4: What? No, I... Ah, let's just move on.
quests_json.Quest.panda_8.step1: Wow, look at this hat. Luna must have worn this often. It's beautifully worn in.
quests_json.Quest.panda_8.step2: You've taken quite an interest in Luna's belongings, haven't you, Grizzly?
quests_json.Quest.panda_8.step3: Just trying to understand her better. For the sake of our mission, of course.
quests_json.Quest.panda_8.step4: Of course, for the sake of the mission. What else could it be?
quests_json.Quest.panda_9.step1: Look at this. An ancient cane, adorned with symbols and intricate carvings. This must have been Luna's.
quests_json.Quest.panda_9.step2: There's a magic aura emanating from this cane. Luna wasn't just an ordinary leader, but a sorceress as well.
quests_json.Quest.panda_9.step3: Indeed, Luna Bamboo was the Chief of her clan. This cane was a symbol of her authority and her connection to the ancient magic of the Panda clan.
quests_json.Quest.panda_9.step4: Magic and leadership in one cane? What if we hit someone with it, will they become magically obedient?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_1.step1: This small pebble... there's a strange energy surrounding it. It's unlike anything we've come across before.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_1.step2: It sure doesn't taste like any rock I've ever eaten. Maybe we're onto something new here?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_1.step3: Indeed, Hog Rider. This pebble might just be the first piece of a bigger puzzle.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_1.step4: We should gather more of these. Who knows what secrets they might reveal as we merge them together.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_2.step1: Fascinating! The merged pebbles have formed a sharper, denser object. I believe we have a 'Moon Shard' on our hands.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_2.step2: Strange. This material's composition is nothing like we have on the kingdom's grounds. It's...different.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_2.step3: Different or not, it's still something to work with! We should keep merging, see what it turns into next.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_2.step4: I agree, Gingerbeard. Every mystery uncovered leads us closer to greater knowledge. Keep merging, my friends!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_3.step1: The more we merge, the more I see a similar energy to our Celestial Carriage. It's quite fascinating.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_3.step2: Intriguing... the sphere shape, the glow. Could there be a celestial connection we've yet to fully grasp?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_3.step3: Only one way to find out. Let's keep merging and see what secrets we uncover!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_3.step4: Indeed, this is the essence of our quest. Unraveling the unknown.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_4.step1: Look at this! The structure... It's a lot like a diamond, but different... It's as if it's born from moonlight.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_4.step2: Aye, it sparkles like the night sky. This must surely have celestial significance.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_4.step3: I concur. The resonance of this item is strikingly similar to the Celestial Carriage. There may be more to this than meets the eye.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_4.step4: Our pursuit of knowledge continues then. Merge, merge, and merge again, until the truth is unearthed!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_5.step1: By my beard! These things are tougher than my mother's beef stew!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_5.step2: Strange indeed. It's like they've been... weathered by something other than the elements.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_5.step3: I sense a different kind of magic from these formations. It's unlike anything I've come across.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_5.step4: Well, if these rocks could talk, I bet they'd have some wild tales to tell!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_6.step1: Ha, these formations are starting to look like some kind of plant or a tree, eh?!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_6.step2: Curious. They do seem to have taken a more...organic shape. Maybe they're not just rocks?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_6.step3: Fascinating observation, Emeralda. I believe this might be a sign of more complex processes at work.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_6.step4: Complex process, easy process, I don't care. As long as it doesn't jump up and bite me, I'm good.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_7.step1: Is it just me, or does this 'rock formation' look like a blossom of some sort?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_7.step2: Indeed, it does appear that way. Quite fascinating... and odd. Rocks shouldn't blossom.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_7.step3: Well, there are more things in heaven and earth than are dreamt of in your philosophy.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_7.step4: Oy, I've got a bad feeling about this... If rocks start turning into flowers, what's next? Pigs flying?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_7.step5: I would not mind that at all! Let's keep merging!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_8.step1: Well, I'll be a monkey's uncle. From rocks to blossoms and now, full-blown flowers! This is getting weirder by the minute.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_8.step2: Isn't it beautiful? It's unlike anything we've seen before.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_8.step3: This isn't your average flower. The energy I'm picking up from it... It's extraordinary.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_8.step4: Could this be the secret ingredient for moon pies?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_9.step1: This Moon Stone... It has the same energy frequency as the Celestial Carriage. Could it be the key to power it up?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_9.step2: Powering up a chariot with a stone? Now I've heard everything.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_9.step3: Well, it does make sense, in a twisted, magical sort of way...
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_9.step4: Remember, magic is just science we don't understand yet. We may be on to something!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_10.step1: An obelisk... Why does this remind me of the Celestial Carriage? Maybe because they both have a similar glow and energy?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_10.step2: Could this Obelisk be a 'fuel station' for the Carriage?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_10.step3: Fuel station? And here I was thinking it could be a huge toothpick!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_10.step4: While your thoughts are fascinating, let's focus. We may be a step closer to igniting our Carriage!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_11.step1: Remarkable, a perfectly formed Cube! Its energy feels identical to the Celestial Carriage.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_11.step2: Ha, we found it! Let's just shove it into the Carriage's engine and be done with it!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_11.step3: Patience, Gingerbeard. The composition of this Cube doesn't exactly match the engine's keyhole. But we're on the right path...
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_11.step4: Alright, alright... On to the next giant space rock then!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_13.step1: Hold up, team. What on earth... or should I say, what on the moon is this?
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_13.step2: Looks like a sad pile of moon rubble if you ask me. A bit like your attempts at humor, Grizzly!
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_13.step3: Aye, 'tis a wreck alright, but... it's not just a pile of rocks. It looks... deliberate.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_13.step4: You're correct, Hog Rider. It appears to be some kind of structure, but it's in ruins.
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_13.step5: This means we're not the first ones to attempt this celestial journey. Someone or something has been here before...
quests_json.Quest.moonstone_13.step6: And they've left us a clue. Let's collect these pieces. Perhaps, we can rebuild this structure and learn its purpose.

rapunzel_json.Tutorial.rapunzel.step3: Now, with all of the ingredients in place, let's see what becomes of it!
rapunzel_json.Tutorial.rapunzel2.step1: These dollhouses are in our way. Let's remove them to get to the princess.
