rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoll_3.step1: Wow! Just look at it. This castle is so big. It’s so easy to get lost… and the fog doesn’t help!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoll_3.step2: This is exactly what happened to princess Eleonora! And this brave prince embarked on a journey to find her.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoll_3.step3: We can’t just stand and watch him do it alone. Let’s help!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step1: Where does this pleasant aroma come from?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step2: I think those are the fragrances from the princess’ collection.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step3: If she can smell them too it will help her find the way back to her chambers.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step4: Great idea, let’s find the rest and try it!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcandle_3.step1: I think if we get more of these candelabras we will have enough light to see the princess even in the darkest corners of the castle.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcandle_3.step2: This is the best idea we’ve had so far!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpjewelry_3.step1: One thing the princess can’t live without is her jewelry.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpjewelry_3.step2: No wonder… It's so pretty and shiny.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpjewelry_3.step3: Shiny… Of course! We can use it to signal the princess our location.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcomb_3.step1: Apparently, princess’ hair possesses magic powers.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcomb_3.step2: Why doesn't she use it to find her way back?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcomb_3.step3: She’s missing the hair brush required to activate them. If only we could find a way to bring it to her…
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpanimals_3.step1: You know what? I was thinking that if we can’t get the job done it might not be such a bad idea to delegate it to our four-legged friends.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpanimals_3.step2: I am so desperate to find the princess so I am willing to try anything!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step1: Don't you have a feeling that this castle is one giant wardrobe? How many dresses are enough...
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step2: This does not surprise me since we are in the princess' chambers. I bet your house is full of your things too.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step3: Yes. The only difference is that I don't have a handsome prince who is always ready to come to the rescue.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step4: Speaking about the prince, let’s find the rest of the garments and bring them to him.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpchameleon_3.step1: What a cute little creature. Did you ever dream about having a pet?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpchameleon_3.step2: Even if I did, it would not be a chameleon.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpchameleon_3.step4: It becomes impossible to find one when it mimics the surroundings. So once we have it, we should bring it to the prince before it disappears.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_1.step1: The princess must be somewhere nearby. This pan has her initials on it.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_1.step2: It’s a good sign. Let’s keep looking!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_2.step1: What a wonderful cupcake! You can tell that the princess made it.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_2.step2: I guess cooking is just one of her many talents. Let’s see what else we can find!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_3.step1: Do you think the princess left the lanterns behind so she can find her way back home?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_3.step2: Or so that we can trace her! Let’s follow the lanterns. I am sure they will shed light on other clues.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_4.step1: Just look at this flower! Why is it glowing?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_4.step2: I think the princess is the right person to ask this question. Let’s find her to get all the answers!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step1: Did you know that the princess loves to paint?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step2: I am not surprised. We saw her talents displayed before.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step3: I am starting to think that she painted this castle…
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step4: I bet she regrets not drafting its map.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step1: Did you ever wonder what a princess’ dress might look like?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step2: I am more curious if she made it herself.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step3: I think we saw enough evidence of her various skills. Sewing a dress, how hard can it be?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step4: Let’s make more and find out!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7.step1: We know that Eleonora is somewhere in the castle and that we can only find her if we all work together.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7.step2: That is indeed the case. If we manage to remove the fog and find all the clues, make no mistake, the princess will be saved.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7.step3: Alright then. Let's proceed with collecting the ingredients and see where we can find the first clue!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7_2.step1: It seems like this castle is still full of surprises!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7_2.step2: And the young princess here is kind enough to guide us through them. Are you ready for another adventure?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7_2.step3: Sure I am! Let's split and find what else hides behind that fog!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcentaur_0_2.step1: We haven't been properly introduced yet but we don't have time for pleasantries! The fate of the universe depends on you!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcentaur_0_2.step2: What? Why? We're just passing by.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcentaur_0_2.step3: I don't believe in accidents. You're here for a reason.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcentaur_0_2.step4: Alright, alright. What should we begin with?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptelescope_0.step1: If my calculations are correct, and they are, there is a meteorite coming our way. I know how to set it off course, but my telescope is missing a unique lens. I need your help with that.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptelescope_0.step2: Sounds easy enough. Just tell us where we can get the lens.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptelescope_0.step3: Get the lens? You can't just get it, we need to make it using the rarest materials and my patented technology. Just go to the mine. My minions are expecting you.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_0.step1: Hey, guys. Your boss told us that we can collect some unique resources required to produce some unique lenses. Do you know anything about it?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_0.step2: Of course, we've been learning to mine it for the longest time to stop the meteorite. The thing is...
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_0.step3: Let me guess, your partner is littered with stones? Don't feel bad, we've all been there.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_0.step4: Thanks. We would have to rescue him before we can rescue the world.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_1.step1: Thanks for saving me. I will have to check the breaks on our trolley but first let me return the favor by clearing that rubble.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_1.step2: It seems like time is of the essence here. So let's all work together to make things faster.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_2.step3: The trolley we use to collect the resources is broken.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_2.step4: Don't you worry about it. We're second to none when it comes to fixing things. It will be done lickety-split!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_3.step1: You weren't lying. You're good at fixing stuff. Well, let us show you how fast we can mine resources.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rppress_1.step1: It looks like the collapse affected the crane too. Do you have experience fixing heavy machinery?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rppress_1.step2: Do we have experience fixing heavy machinery? Please, we can fix anything even if it's not broken.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcrane_1.step1: Oh my god, Alvin will kill us! We've broken his press. Without it, we can produce lenses for the telescope.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcrane_1.step2: In that case, it might be the meteorite that kills you.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcrane_1.step3: Don't worry, guys. It's an easy fix. We just need to find all the spare parts and work in tandem.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_0.step1: Why are all of the books piled up? Whoever did this clearly didn't understand what kind of treasure was in his possession.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_0.step2: Or maybe someone was trying to hide some other treasures they might have had. Let's clean this up and find out!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_1.step1: The books keep on coming our way. Maybe it's a sign that we should read more?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_1.step2: I think after we clean this mess up we will officially become the most well-read janitors in the world.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_2.step1: Finally! No more books. It looks like we're done here.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_2.step2: Aren't you curious to find out what hides behind this door?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_2.step3: I am. But what if there are more books? I would not survive this.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_2.step4: I promise you, even if we stumble on just a page, we will immediately abandon this endeavor and indulge ourselves with something less sophisticated.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_3.step1: To be honest, I am scared to go inside.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_3.step2: Don't be. Fortune favors the brave!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_1.step1: Have you seen the prince? I think he lost his gloves.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_1.step2: He went to get a gift for the princess to celebrate her return but got lost himself...
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_1.step3: That's horrible! We must save him too.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_2.step1: Here comes the hat. We're getting closer.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_2.step2: I wouldn't get your hopes up. The castle is even bigger than we thought before...
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_3.step1: He wouldn't get too far without his boots, would he?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_3.step2: No, but what if he had a spare pair? As far as I am concerned, he can be anywhere so we should search every last corner.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_4.step1: Oh no, the poor prince lost his saber. What if he gets in trouble in the dungeon or something even worse happens?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_4.step2: In that case, we should probably try and find him as soon as possible rather than contemplating this misfortune.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_5.step1: The sight of this medal calms me down.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_5.step3: It's evidence of the fact that the prince can stand up for himself if it comes to that.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_5.step4: Still, we should hurry up to find him. Who knows what other secrets this castle might have?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_6.step1: What a gorgeous doublet. I think we owe it to the prince to reunite him with it.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_6.step2: I couldn't agree more. Let's hope that we are getting closer!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rapunzel2_chop.step1: Let's provide the princess with the ingredients so she could help us reveal the castle's secrets!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptelescope_open.step2: Let's keep looking. I have a feeling that we are going to find something very soon!

rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.rapunzel.step1: We finally found our princess. Hooray!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.rapunzel.step2: I would love to share your excitement but I don’t think it’s the princess. It might be her younger sister or her younger self.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.rapunzel.step3: Her younger self? How is that possible?
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.rapunzel.step4: Do not forget that this castle is full of magic. Whoever this is, I am sure she can lead us to Eleonora!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.rapunzel.step1: We did it! The princess is safe. And we make a great team!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.rapunzel.step2: We always do. It just took you a trip to a magic castle to realize that.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.rapunzel.step3: No, I always knew that. I just love to use every opportunity to remind everyone of it.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.rapunzel.step4: I hope you’ll get another chance to do that on our next adventure!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoll_2.rapunzel.step2: I don’t think so. Still looks like a doll.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoll_2.rapunzel.step3: A nicely made one. I hope it can help us get to the princess herself.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rptelescope_1.rapunzel2.step1: Well done, guys. Sorry for being so rude before. I was just worried about the meteorite. But now we have everything to stop it.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rptelescope_1.rapunzel2.step2: It was a team effort. Don't hesitate to ask if you need any help saving the world in the future. We enjoyed every minute of it!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rptelescope_1.rapunzel2.step3: And maybe tell your guys to take it easy the next time.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rptelescope_1.rapunzel2.step4: Will do. If our paths ever cross again, I will consider myself very lucky.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoorway_4.rapunzel2.step1: So, what did I tell you?
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoorway_4.rapunzel2.step2: It's amazing! Looks like we've found a secret chamber.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoorway_4.rapunzel2.step3: Let's find the rest of our team and share the news!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpprincehero_6.rapunzel2.step1: Look! It's a younger version of our prince.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpprincehero_6.rapunzel2.step2: Great. Let's take him back with us. Every young princess deserves to have a young prince!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpprincehero_7.rapunzel2.step1: Thank god we found our prince!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpprincehero_7.rapunzel2.step2: Our job is done. Now, let's deliver him to the princess so they could take care of each other from now on and live happily ever after.

undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step1: A pair of flippers! Luckily we already know how to use them. Let’s merge.
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step2: Swimming is tiring, and I need food! Let's see if we can grow something underwater!
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step3: It worked! But I am starved just by looking at these apples! Let's try to harvest.
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step4: It's a miracle! Let's see if it tastes like one.
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step5: Now I feel like exploring! Let's continue our journey.
undersea_json.TravelBookForce.undersea2: Put your mask back on and continue your underwater adventure!
undersea_json.MissionOfferWindow.Undersea2Pack.title: Ruby Sale

unitStories_json.UnitStory.ruins_0.step1: See these ruins? We have one hour to blow them up.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.ruins_0.step2: Just an hour? Let me get some dynamite!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.ruins_0.step3: Choose the explosive wisely and remember that we only have 60 minutes and the clock is already ticking!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_2.step1: Have you ever seen the king in person?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_2.step2: I haven’t but it will be a real honor.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_3.step2: You saved me, lads. I’m forever in your debt. Let’s get our old lands back and conquer some new ones!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_5.step1: Do you find it insulting when someone uses a hammer instead of a saw?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_5.step2: We live in a free kingdom. Anyone can do anything.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_5.step3: In that case, I’ll go and grab a bite. Let me know when you find another piece.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_6.step2: I’m at your service, King McArthur. How can I be of help?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_6.step3: With your skills and knowledge, we can rebuild our Kingdom from the ground up!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_6.step1: Do we even need more members of our team? Can’t we be the Magnificent four?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_6.step2: We are here not to recruit but to rescue. And if we meet someone worthy along the way it would be a shame not to take advantage of it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_7.step1: Would you be so kind as to join our team?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_7.step2: I guess I have no choice. You saved me.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_7.step3: Yes, I did. Sorry, we did. And I’d like you to stay.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_7.step4: I have nowhere to go anyway until we claim our lands back.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_7.step1: Is anyone hungry? We’ve been looking for these books for ages now!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_7.step2: I know what I’m going to do once we find their owner.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_7.step4: Cast a filling spell on you. It should work like a charm!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_8.step1: I thank you for saving me, fellow residents. I know what you are trying to do and I’m going to help you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_8.step2: How exactly are you going to do that?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_8.step3: I will set you on the path to fulfilling your role as a king of Farawake.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.troll_8.step1: You know what, I think I’m going to let it go.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.troll_8.step3: I’m not scared of these axes and their owner anymore!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.troll_8.step4: That’s great! It means you can carry them now because I definitely need a break.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.troll_9.step1: Fangtooth is ready to fight. Just tell Fangtooth who with.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.troll_9.step2: Easy, soldier. There is no need to brawl.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.troll_9.step4: Don’t worry. There is a job for everyone when rebuilding the kingdom.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.knight_9.step1: I’m so excited to see the owner of this sword. I might not be a champion of weapons but I can appreciate the finest blade when I see it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.knight_9.step2: The smithing is indeed exquisite. This sword and its owner will make a perfect addition to our cause.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.knight_10.step1: Who are you? And what do you think you’re doing? I didn’t ask to be saved. I was perfectly fine on my own.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.knight_10.step2: You’re right. You didn’t ask us for anything. But it doesn’t mean that we don’t need your help.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.knight_10.step3: Is the kingdom in trouble again?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.knight_10.step4: Yes. But together we can save it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_8.step1: It’s getting colder. I have a bad feeling about it all.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_8.step2: Don’t worry, your highness. We’re on the right track.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_9.step1: Thanks for getting me out. I was starting to get hot.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_9.step2: No problem! It feels good to finally be not the only one with a pet.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_9.step3: Snowbreaker is not a pet. He is smarter than most people.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_9.step4: Is it bad that I’m not surprised by it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_6.step1: I think it's the best we can do.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_6.step2: Oh, my dear friend. You have no idea how much more we're capable of!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_9.step1: Good job, lads. This barrack will be a great home for our troops.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_9.step2: Thank you, sir. Now we have no excuse not to recruit them.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_8.step1: The building keeps growing like your belly.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_8.step2: I hope that my hard work will level out the excess calories.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_8.step3: You're an optimist and I like it about you. Let's fight for your fitness!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_10.step1: I’m impressed. This citadel will make our Kingdom impenetrable for invaders.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_10.step2: Let’s hope so. We’ve put a lot of effort into building it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_10.step3: I can tell that you’ll erect many more great structures in the future.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_8.step1: You look tired. Are you sure you don't want to leave the rest to us?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_8.step2: My pride won't let me do that. Let's keep going!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_10.step1: You should be proud of yourself, Grizzly.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_10.step2: I couldn't have done it without your help, guys. It’s our shared success.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_10.step3: I can’t wait to see what more are we capable of!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bamboo_8.step1: You weren't lying, it does look impressive.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bamboo_8.step2: I'm always telling the truth. That's how I learn to make new things.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bamboo_8.step4: By being transperent about the fact that I know nothing.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bamboo_10.step1: This building looks massive. Let’s just hope that it survives whatever future holds for it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bamboo_10.step2: Don’t worry. We’ve made it with any potential danger in mind.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sapphire_9.step1: Do you think she'll like it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sapphire_9.step2: Of course, you poured your heart and soul into it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sapphire_9.step3: I'm not sure if it's enough anymore.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sapphire_9.step4: Let's keep working and hope for the best.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sapphire_11.step1: What a gorgeous castle you’ve got here. Aren’t you scared that it will be destroyed by the enemy?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sapphire_11.step2: Not at all. It’s made out of the most durable mineral out there.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sapphire_11.step3: Sounds impressive. I look forward to what you are going to erect next!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.snow_9.step1: I finally got warm. Hard work is paying off!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.snow_9.step2: You call it hard work? Wait until we start to erect the castle!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.snow_11.step1: Another great project under our belt. We should celebrate!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.snow_11.step2: I’m not going anywhere until this thing proves that it can remain solid under the sun.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.snow_11.step3: Suit yourself. We’re going to the tavern while you freeze your horns.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fruitshop_0.step1: Are you prepared to be blown away?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fruitshop_0.step2: What is it? You've found something to eat? For the millionth time.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fruitshop_0.step3: Better! I don't have to look for food no more. Maybe there is something there for you too.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.resourceshop_0.step1: I need a little help. Do you mind?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.resourceshop_0.step2: You never ask for help. It seems suspicious. And is probably very tiring.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.resourceshop_0.step3: Yes indeed it is. But the more hands we have, the faster we can rebuild the Kingdom using supplies from this store.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.discountshop_0.step2: They've got everything we might need for restoring our Kingdom. I personally know the owner. He is a great wizard.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.discountshop_0.step3: I know nothing about magic but restoring the Kingdom sounds just like what we're trying to do.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_9.step1: Remember how you felt cold when building the snow castle?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_9.step4: Are you kidding? I can't stop sweating but it's too important of a task to stop going.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_11.step2: Was this house built by evil spirits?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_11.step3: What do you know about art, barbarian!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_11.step4: Just think about it! We've got ourselves an impenetrable fortress to protect the Kingdom from all the monsters out there. What an achievement!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_11.step5: Thank you, sire! It is indeed the most impregnable stronghold!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_8.step1: I think now we have everything there is to have. Is it enough to tell us something about the owner?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_8.step2: Let’s hope so. I’ll try my best to provide you with as much information that I could extract.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_8.step3: Thank you. You have no idea how important this quest is. The destiny of the Kingdom lies in your magic hands.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_9.step1: Alvin? Is that really you? I’m so glad to finally see you again!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_9.step2: I’m happy to see you too, Mr. McArthur! How did you find me? I thought I hid pretty well.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_9.step3: What can I say, we have the best team in the entire realm. I think we have a lot to talk about.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_9.step4: That is so true. I don’t even know where to start.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_0.dragonia.step1: The tree of life! We’ve finally found it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_0.dragonia.step2: I didn’t even know we were looking for it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_0.dragonia.step3: Yes, sire, enlighten us. What is it and why do we need it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_0.dragonia.step4: Patience, lads. It’s all going to become clear very soon. Just be careful and keep your eyes open.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_1.dragonia.step1: Dragons, trees, flying islands. I miss our home where you can worry about what to eat and not about being eaten.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_1.dragonia.step2: Funny enough, I know how you feel. But if the king says that this tree is important, then it actually is. Let’s get to work.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_2.dragonia.step1: Who are you and what do you think you’re doing?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_2.dragonia.step2: Excuse me, we can ask you the same thing.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_2.dragonia.step4: We are not here to claim your land. We’re here only for the tree.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_2.dragonia.step5: Of course you’re. Like so many others before you. Good luck failing!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_3.dragonia.step1: Sire, do you know who this Zafira is and why does she act as everything here belongs to her?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_3.dragonia.step2: I’m not aware of who she is but I understand why she doesn’t want us to succeed.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_3.dragonia.step3: Are you going to tell us?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_3.dragonia.step4: Of course. There is a time for everything. And now it’s time to work!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_4.dragonia.step1: You have no idea what you’re getting yourselves into. You’re doomed even before you begin.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_4.dragonia.step2: And you don’t know our king. He would never send us to fail. Plus, we already made some progress.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_4.dragonia.step3: It might seem like it now, but, trust me, looks can be deceiving.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_4.dragonia.step4: With all due respect, there is no way we can trust you. And the only way we can fail is if you keep on talking under our noses.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_5.dragonia.step1: This girl is resilient, sire. Should we be worried?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_5.dragonia.step2: Of course not. Soon, we’ll have nothing to worry about at all.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_5.dragonia.step4: Once the tree fully reveals itself to us and showers us with its riches our Kingdom will become the most prosperous of all.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_6.dragonia.step1: You said that the king knows what’s he doing. But do we really need more? Not a single kingdom in the Seventh realm can match our power and resources.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_6.dragonia.step2: I will not lie, I have my share of doubts too. And the only way to dispel them is through work for the good of the Kingdom.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_7.dragonia.step1: It’s nice to have lieges so blinded by their own faith in their ruler so they can’t even see when he goes mad, isn't it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_7.dragonia.step2: Zafira, right? I’ve no idea what you’re talking about. I’m not mad and my people aren’t blind. They’re loyal.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_7.dragonia.step3: Loyal enough to bend innocent dragons to your will?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_7.dragonia.step4: We harm no one. And if this is what it takes to secure the future of my Kingdom, I would gladly wear such a blindfold myself.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_8.dragonia.step1: Your king is stubborn so I trust in your good judgment. Pack your things and leave the island before it’s too late.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_8.dragonia.step2: If it’s such a bad place what are you doing here yourself?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_8.dragonia.step3: I keep it safe from barbarians like you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_8.dragonia.step4: It’s just got personal. I will not rest until this tree gives everything it has to give.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_9.dragonia.step1: Sire, can we just dig up the tree and replant it in our Kingdom?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_9.dragonia.step2: I’m afraid it doesn’t work like that. Everything on this island from soil to dragons nurtures the tree and keeps it alive. If treated right, it can become the source of limitless resources.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_9.dragonia.step3: But do we really need them? We’ve been doing fine on our own without any trees of life.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_9.dragonia.step4: Please, never question my authority ever again. I’m your king and you’ll do as I say.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_10.dragonia.step1: I’ve never seen our king like this before. I don’t know what to think.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_10.dragonia.step2: The power of the tree made him mindless. I’m glad you can appreciate that.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_10.dragonia.step3: No. I’m sure there is a reason for all that.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_10.dragonia.step4: And we will not rest until we find out what this is.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_11.dragonia.step1: Do you think I’m being too harsh on the lads?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_11.dragonia.step2: Desperate times call for desperate measures. The war with evil spirits shook us pretty hard. If others find out about our vulnerabilities before we deal with them, our kingdom can cease to exist…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_12.dragonia.step2: Everything is fine, sire. Just doing our job, serving our kingdom…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_12.dragonia.step3: Ahem. About that. I wanted to tell you something.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_12.dragonia.step5: Well… The kingdom is very lucky to have you on its side. Keep up the good work!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_13.dragonia.step1: Still thinking that there is more to your king than pure vanity and greed?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_13.dragonia.step2: I don’t know what to think anymore.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_13.dragonia.step3: I think we should not be putting up with it no more.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_13.dragonia.step4: Finally! If you ever get banished you can hang out here.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_14.dragonia.step1: Sire, we need to talk to you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_14.dragonia.step3: We believe it’s unfair to make us follow this cause designed to satisfy your avarice.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_14.dragonia.step4: I feared you might feel this way but…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_14.dragonia.step5: We’ll do the last round of preparation for the old times' sake but consider it our resignation. We’re going to stay here, with Zafira and her dragons.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_14.dragonia.step6: That’s right! Because these cold-blooded creatures are more empathic than you’ll ever be!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_15.dragonia.step2: There aren’t many options left, sire. Let’s try to finish what we’ve started. For the Kingdom.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_16.dragonia.step2: I’ve been asking myself the same question. Maybe there is something more to it than just greed, after all.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_16.dragonia.step3: Or maybe the greed is just all-consuming.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_16.dragonia.step4: Maybe… But I won’t be able to live with myself if we don’t find out the truth.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_17.dragonia.step1: It’s harder than I thought, Grizzly. I always appreciated the input lads made but I had no idea how much of a difference they made.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_17.dragonia.step2: I know, sire. These are the best lads. We were lucky to work and fight side by side.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_17.dragonia.step3: Let’s not make all the work they’ve done so far go in vain!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_18.dragonia.step1: Lads? What are you doing here? I thought you were done.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_18.dragonia.step2: We were. But something is not right about all that. Shed the light on the truth, your majesty.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_18.dragonia.step3: I didn’t want to tell you but the Kingdom is having some trouble even despite your invaluable contribution. The war didn’t go unnoticed.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_18.dragonia.step4: You should’ve told us, sire! The Kingdom is our home. We will do anything to save it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_19.dragonia.step1: It’s so good having you back! Grizzly and I were dying out there alone.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_19.dragonia.step2: Yes, this job is tough and you’re the best ones at it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_19.dragonia.step3: It’s good to be back. We had our rest and now it’s time to finish this!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_20.dragonia.step1: I never thought I would say this but I’m exhausted. The bigger the tree gets the harder it becomes to grow it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_20.dragonia.step2: Maybe we should ask Zafira for help?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_20.dragonia.step3: The dragon keeper? She hates my guts. She would rather see us fail than reach out a helping hand.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_20.dragonia.step4: If there is anything this journey taught us it’s that it’s dangerous to jump to conclusions. Let us talk to her!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_21.dragonia.step1: You need my help? Not in a million years!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_21.dragonia.step2: Wouldn’t you do anything to save your home? Look how hard you’re trying to protect it now.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_21.dragonia.step3: I’ll admit, I underestimated you and your king. Maybe you’re worthy of the tree of life.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_21.dragonia.step4: Even if we aren’t, the citizens of the Kingdom deserve to be rescued. You’re their last hope!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_22.dragonia.step1: Welcome aboard, Zafira. We’re forever in your debt.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_22.dragonia.step2: Don’t thank me yet. It’s tricky to fully grow the tree of life.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_22.dragonia.step3: That’s why we’re so lucky to have you on our side. Just tell us what to do.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_23.dragonia.step1: I must say, you work pretty well as a team.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_23.dragonia.step2: Well, thank you. You’re welcome to join us anytime.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_23.dragonia.step3: I appreciate the offer, but I prefer working alone.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_23.dragonia.step4: I used to be like that too when I was your age. Just know that our doors are always open to you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_24.dragonia.step1: We’re almost there. No one has ever gotten so close to harnessing the power of the tree. You must be pretty special.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_24.dragonia.step2: We’re just a bunch of guys trying to do their best to save their people.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_24.dragonia.step3: This is more than enough. Let’s see where it gets you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_25.dragonia.step1: We did it! The kingdom is safe now. I thank you all for the fantastic job you did despite all the obstacles.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_25.dragonia.step2: We thank you too, your majesty. If it wasn’t for your command, the Kingdom wouldn’t survive these dark times.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_25.dragonia.step3: It was nice getting to know your lot. Feel free to visit us any time you want. I guess, the dragons will miss youю Maybe not only dragons.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.drbattlepass_25.dragonia.step4: We’ll miss you too. We promise to come back once things settle down in the Kingdom.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_0.step1: We were sent here to find some great treasure. Is this piece of wood a joke?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_0.step2: Don’t give up just yet, lads. Let’s keep looking. Even if you don’t find anything, try to enjoy yourself.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_1.step1: I didn’t know that Atlanteans valued logs more than gold. Time made us greedier.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_1.step2: Don’t be so dramatic. There is got to be an explanation for all that.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_1.step3: I would sacrifice one of my meals to hear it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_2.step1: Since you were the one who told us about the magic tridents and this special place, we would like to know some more.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_2.step2: Yes, what are we really doing here? And where is the treasure?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_2.step3: I had a vision. It said that we needed to come here. That we will find indescribable riches here. That’s all I know. And I need your help to understand the rest.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_3.step1: So, what are we supposed to do?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_3.step2: Let's just keep on examining this boat and see what we can make of it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_4.step1: Don’t you find it hard working when everything around you is covered with uncertainty?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_4.step2: On the contrary. I’m at my best when you put me on the brink of new discoveries. So let’s roll up our sleeves and find out the truth!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_5.step1: Sire, aren’t you worried about the team? They started to ask questions.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_5.step2: I’m always worried about my people because I have their best interests at heart.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_5.step3: I’ll try my best to keep them in the dark but they’ll find out the truth eventually.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_5.step4: In that case, let’s use the time we have left wisely.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_6.step1: Aren’t you curious how did this thing end up underwater?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_6.step2: Not really. Vessels sink and it’s inevitable. I just hope that all of the crew members made it to safety.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_7.step1: I’m starting to think that I’ll not get a chance to rest ever again.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_7.step3: I don’t know… Maybe the fact that we’re constantly exploring peculiar places? First, floating island full of dragons, and now this…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_7.step4: You have nothing to complain about, my friend. Being a pioneer is the noblest thing in the world!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_8.step2: I have to admit, sire, it’s not easy to keep looking for something that you’ve never seen before.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_8.step3: But this is the only way to discover truly astonishing things.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_9.step1: Is it possible to get tired underwater?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_9.step2: It’s a tricky question. On one hand, you have more resistance. On the other, you experience a certain level of weightlessness which…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_9.step3: Not tricky at all! I’m tired and I think we should ask for help.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_10.step1: Hey, Grizzly, I know that it’s unconventional for a strong man like myself to ask for help but here we are…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_10.step2: Sure, no problem. But I got to finish my research first. Trust me, you’ll be blown away when I reveal my findings to you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_10.step3: You know how to make me want to work even harder!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_11.step1: Are you ready, guys? Prepare to be amazed!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_11.step2: Sure. I doubt that anything can surprise me at this point.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_11.step3: How about this then? The tridents we’ve been collecting are being fetched from the future!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_11.step4: I need some time to process what you just said. Do get back to me when I’m done being shocked.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_12.step1: What’s that? It doesn’t look like your normal ship.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_12.step2: Remember what I said about the tridents being from the future?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_12.step3: I do remember it but I still don’t get it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_12.step4: Let’s find more evidence before I try to interpret my findings for you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_13.step1: Are you saying that both the tridents and the ships come from the future?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_13.step2: Yes and no. This ship is sitting on a portal that can transport any vessel from any given point in time. It was discovered by the people of Atlantis and caused the entire city to flood.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_13.step3: Did you get all that just from studying the tridents?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_13.step4: Not exactly. I still have some questions myself so I suggest we share this information with the King. He is a wise man who might know something.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_14.step1: Sire, Grizzly discovered something extraordinary about this whole place.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_14.step2: Yes, your highness. I believe that we might be dealing with time travel here.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_14.step3: Sounds very interesting indeed. Why don’t you go and study it a little bit more while I gather my thoughts?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_15.step1: Didn’t you find the king’s reaction strange?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_15.step2: To be fair, it’s a strange concept to wrap your head around. Let’s give him time while we continue our search.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_16.step1: I’m afraid that the time has come. The genie is out of the bottle.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_16.step2: Do they know the whole truth?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_16.step3: Not yet. But it’s just a matter of time before they find out about the actual reason why we’re here.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_17.step1: Things just got more interesting. Remember I told you that the tridents were from the future? It turns out they were made by us at the kingdom.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_17.step3: I think that this is the question we have to address to the person who produced them…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_18.step1: You told us that you knew nothing about this place! That it was just a vision and that you needed our help… Why would you lie to us?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_18.step2: I did see a vision. Not of Atlantis, though, but of our Kingdom. It was covered by water. I had to do something to prevent it. We’ve already lost our home once, I didn’t want for it to happen again.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_19.step1: So, this treasure you told us about… Was it also a lie?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_19.step2: No. This was the most honest thing I could say to you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_19.step3: Where is it, then? We scoured the whole bottom of the sea but found nothing.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_19.step4: Haven’t you? Nothing can’t be more precious than securing the well-being of your homeland.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_20.step1: I still don’t get it. How finding all of these ships will help us save the Kingdom?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_20.step2: The god of water has some unfinished business here. If we finish what did locals started his desire will be fulfilled.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_20.step3: Uncover the rest of Atlantis and bring all of the sunk ships back to life. Sounds like a plan!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_21.step1: As a science enthusiast, I have one question left. How did you make the tridents that could unlock the Atlantis?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_21.step2: I had to read a lot of books and cast a lot of spells to find the right one.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_21.step3: So, there was nothing scientific about it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_22.step1: Did you know the truth all along, sire?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_22.step2: I did. The enchantress came to me with her vision and we devised a plan but we had to keep it a secret to avoid any panic in our midst. I’m sorry you had to find out this way.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_22.step3: Not at all, your highness. Thankfully, we have enough time left to put your plan to action.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_23.step1: Will you ever be able to come near water again?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_23.step2: To be honest, I enjoyed every little bit of our undersea adventure. Plus it’s a great place to visit when you want to take a break from the bustling kingdom grounds.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_23.step3: That’s good because we’ll definitely have to come back here occasionally to check if everything is okay.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_24.step1: What if there is actually a chest full of gold somewhere here?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_24.step2: When did you stop carrying so much about food and become obsessed with material possessions?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_24.step3: It’s impossible to think about food when you’re surrounded by seaweed. I had to sublimate.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_25.step1: We did it! All the ships are saved. So is the Kingdom.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_25.step2: Great job you all! As always, however.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_25.step3: Thank you, your highness. I wonder what other adventures life will bestow on us?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_25.step4: No matter what it is, we’ll be ready!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_9.step1: They’re about to light the barrel up. Is it finally time to do something?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_9.step2: Yes. Let’s interfere and see what they have to say for themselves.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_10.step1: Who are you and what do you think you are doing?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_10.step2: I’m Bob. And this is Big. We’re heisting the Royal Treasury.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_10.step3: It’s a funny joke. I never heard of it before.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_10.step4: Come with us, Big and Bob, there are a few things we need to discuss.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_9.step1: What a wonderful villa we built. And look at these palm trees! I wonder how many coconuts are on them. Oops, sorry.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_9.step2: It’s okay. You don’t have to change who you are because of me…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_9.step3: You're absolutely right! And you don’t have to change who you are either. I’ve got a solution.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_11.step1: Here you go, Grizzly. We turned the sand you found into something magical.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_11.step2: Speaking of magic, the elixir is ready. You can drink it anytime you feel hungry. It has all the nutrients and vitamins and the best thing is… It helps you lose weight!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_11.step3: I don’t know what to say, Grizzly… This is amazing!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_11.step4: Don’t mention it. I hope it gives you enough strength to take on another challenge!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.caravanship_0.step1: Do you know what time is it? It's best offer o'clock!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.caravanship_0.step2: Is the Eastern Caravan on its way? This is our chance to buy goods with huge discounts.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.caravanship_0.step3: Yes, and we need to hurry up, since it's only in town for a couple of days...
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_9.step1: To be honest, I’m starting to understand why the emperor liked staying at the castle.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_9.step2: Hold your horses, cowboy. It’s not yet it. Trust me, you’ll know when you see it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_11.step1: Can you see the difference between the castle and the rest of the terracotta buildings now?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_11.step2: Oh yeah. It is indeed huge and gorgeous. I hope it will serve the people of the kingdom well!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.kraken_0.step1: I didn't know that there were giant squids in our waters.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.kraken_0.step2: I bet you also didn't know that we can use the keys to fight evil spirits. Let me show you how it's done!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_0.step1: Do you want to see something cool?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_0.step2: Please, don’t say that it’s another deposit that you’ve found. I’m tired of building things, I just want to kick back and relax.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_0.step3: To be honest, I’m not sure what it is yet, but I was hoping you would help me find out.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_1.step1: I also found this. If it helps…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_1.step2: Not really. If anything, it makes everything more complicated. I don’t know what should we do next.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_1.step3: Well, you know what they say. When something doesn’t make sense, reach out to the giant bear in the armor.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_2.step1: Sorry to bother you, Grizzly, but we need your expertise. It seems like we stumbled upon a peculiar item from the future…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_2.step2: You lads are silly! It’s actually from the past because I’ve been working on it for a few weeks already.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_2.step3: Really? What is it for? What does it do? Is it edible?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_2.step4: Enough with the questions. It’s something designed to be seen, not talked about. I better show it to you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_3.step1: A place to kick back and relax and get rewarded on top of that? The dream came true!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_3.step2: I’m glad that you like it. I thought we did great with refurbishing the Kingdom, so we deserve a place to rest.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_3.step3: Indeed we do! Come on, let’s take a look at the rewards we can get for using this magical device!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bank_0.step1: I have exciting news to share with you, lads! You helped to get the Kingdom up from its knees, and now I want you to cut the ribbon at the opening of the Royal Bank.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bank_0.step2: The opening of the Royal Bank, sire? What does this mean for our Kingdom?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bank_0.step3: It means that now everyone has an opportunity to deposit their views and earn the rewards.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bank_0.step4: How exciting! Let’s try it now and collect the interest.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fog_fog4_0.step1: You're probably trying your best but you are doing everything wrong.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fog_fog4_0.step2: Am I? Come on then, show me how it is done, Mr Know It All!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fog_fog4_0.step3: The more pieces you merge at once, the more items you get as a result.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fog_fog4_0.step4: Enough words, let's test your theory in practice!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_0.step1: Um, sire, would you be so kind as to tell us why are we back here? And of what interest are these ruins to us?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_0.step2: Please don’t say that the kingdom is in trouble. Again.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_0.step3: One thing past experience taught me is to be honest with my men, so I won’t say that the kingdom is in trouble.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_0.step4: Say something, though, please. You can’t see me sweat here but I am pretty nervous!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_1.step1: Although the Kingdom is not in trouble, we should always be on the lookout for threats and strengthen our alliances.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_1.step2: We want to be prepared by helping rebuild Atlantis and placing one of our strategic headquarters here. We have 20 days to do that.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_1.step3: Building an underwater fort on such short notice sounds like a hard thing to do. Although I’d love a challenge, I can’t do it without you. Will you help me?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_1.step4: Of course, Grizzly, if there is one thing past experience taught us, it is that it’s easier to carry heavy materials underwater than it is on land.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_2.step1: Are you happy to be back? The local architecture looks very authentic.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_2.step2: On one hand, I just dried off from the last time. On the other one, I had a blast saving Atlantis.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_2.step3: And they say that you can’t walk into the same river twice…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_2.step4: Technically, it’s not a river. So we should be good!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_3.step1: Do you really think we can build a fort here? Saving sunken vessels is one thing, subaquatic construction is completely another.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_3.step2: I wouldn’t have taken on this challenge if I hadn’t had you by my side.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_3.step3: It’s good that the pressure feels differently underwater. Otherwise, my hands would be shaking right now.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_4.step1: Will you consider moving here if the building turns out alright?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_4.step2: First of all, there are no ifs. It will be great! And secondly, why not? I can be the Gatekeeper of Atlantis.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_4.step3: You know what? This is probably the fanciest way to call a night watchman. Good for you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_5.step2: Everything is great, your highness. We’re making history here. All thanks to you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_5.step3: I am nothing more than a reflection of the people of the Kingdom.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_5.step4: With a mirror like you, sire, our future will always look bright.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_6.step1: I’ve been thinking, what if we build an aquarium on our island and call it the Atlantic quarters?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_6.step2: Are you getting attached to the local fish?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_6.step3: No. I don’t know. Maybe a little bit.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_6.step4: Don’t worry, you can always come and stay here whenever you feel like visiting them.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_7.step1: Do you find undersea construction easier? After all, the water is doing all the heavy lifting.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_7.step2: I always told you that if you work with your head, you can always make things easier for you, be it land or water.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_7.step3: Anyway, I am glad that we were able to build this stunner so fast.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_8.step1: Are we still on schedule? I am not trying to push you. Just wondering if everything is going according to the plan.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_8.step2: Let me run a few tests, your highness. This will help me evaluate the progress.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_8.step3: Sure thing, Grizzly. The building does look great so I can’t wait to see it finished!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_9.step1: Is everything okay, Grizzly? You look less cheerful than usual.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_9.step2: Everything is fine. At least for now. I have a reason to worry but it hasn’t been confirmed yet. Just keep going, you’re doing great!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_10.step1: Guys, I think we might have a problem.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_10.step2: What is it, Grizzly? You thought they were little honey bubbles but they turned out to be caviar?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_10.step3: I have a reason to believe that our materials aren’t suitable for underwater construction.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_11.step1: I think you just worry too much. This building looks just fine.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_11.step2: I ran some extended tests that showed that it will be washed out over time.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_11.step4: No. We’ve come too far already. I just need to find a way to alter the destruction process.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_12.step1: I must admit, I became attached to our headquarters. And it’s not even finished yet.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_12.step2: Me too. Do you think Grizzly will find a solution?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_12.step3: I hope so. This brilliant mind of his will definitely figure something out!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_13.step1: I heard of the problem, Grizzly. How are you doing?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_13.step2: News travels fast, your highness. It’s not my brightest moment but I’ll try my best to find the solution.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_13.step3: I have an idea. Let’s gather the team to discuss it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_14.step1: You wanted to see us, sire?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_14.step2: First of all, the building looks amazing.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_14.step3: Thank you, your highness. There is a caveat, though…
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_14.step4: I know. That’s why we are all here. We must all do our best if we want to succeed.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_15.step1: What are you suggesting, your highness?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_15.step2: I know that our Grizzly is very bright and capable but it’s impossible to come up with the required solution while being underwater without proper tools.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_15.step3: He should go back to the island and work on the formula in his laboratory while I take over the construction in his stead.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_15.step4: Thank you, your highness. You’re the best leader anyone can wish for!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_16.step1: I know that you're great, your highness, but do you think we can manage without Grizzly?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_16.step2: I look at what you accomplished so far and do not doubt our success. Not even for a second! It can easily change, though, if we keep talking instead of working.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_17.step1: I can confirm that Grizzly has reached the island safely and buried himself in the lab under books whose titles I can’t even read.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_17.step2: We appreciate the update, Sir Mergelot. Do you like what you see?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_17.step3: Let me put it this way, your highness. It will be a tragedy if Grizzly doesn’t find a solution.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_18.step1: Even if we can’t find a way to make this building last forever, I really enjoyed constructing it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_18.step2: Agreed! But if justice exists, then it will prevail!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_19.step1: Any news from Grizzly, sir Mergelot?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_19.step2: I am afraid not, sire. Nobody has left or entered the laboratory since we last spoke.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_19.step3: Alright then. This building deserves to be finished anyway. Let’s make it the best we can. The rest is not up to us.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_20.step1: There is still work left to do but not that much time left. I think it’s my turn to roll up my sleeves.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_20.step2: Are you sure, your highness? We can try to be faster.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_20.step3: I’m afraid it won’t help, you’re already giving it your everything.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_21.step1: I can’t believe my eyes! What are you doing, sire?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_21.step2: Just trying to be a part of the team. The greatest team I’ve had a chance to work with!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_22.step1: Sorry to interrupt you, your highness. But there is news. News you would like to hear.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_22.step2: It’s better to be good, Sir Mergelot. I was quite enjoying myself on the construction site. Look at that beauty!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_22.step3: It’s Grizzly, sire. He is coming back as fast as he can.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step1: How do you like the news, lads?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step2: It’s great, sire! Did he come up with a solution?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step3: This is something we have to hear from him.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step4: Let's welcome him back with our best work, then!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_24.step1: Grizzly! It’s so good to see you. Even if this building turns to dust tomorrow.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_24.step2: I am happy to see you too. And don’t you worry about the building. It took longer than I expected, but the formula is ready. We just need to apply it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step1: What a fantastic job, lads. All of you! I know that I said it a million times already, but you’re the best team a king can wish for.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step2: Thank you, sire! It’s an honor to be a part of this union.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step3: And to work alongside a genius! How were you able to turn things around, Grizzly?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step4: I don’t want to bore you with the details. Let’s just say that I had no option to fail since you were doing the best you can!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2tournament_0.step1: I know we are busy building the headquarters but I bet I can beat you in a race!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2tournament_0.step2: You can beat me? Please. Any snail will be faster than you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2tournament_0.step3: Why don't you both pick a snail and find out whose pet is faster?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2tournament_0.step4: What a splendid idea. And I shall nominate the reward for the winner. Consider Atlantic games open!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_9.step1: Look what we found while installing the nets.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_9.step2: It’s a captain’s hat. I guess our fish is bigger than we thought.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_9.step3: We should be extra careful, then. Forget what I said about the dynamite. Whatever it takes to catch him!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_10.step2: You have the right to remain silent. In case you can talk.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_10.step3: Great job, everyone. Now, let’s find out who this is and what he is doing here.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_10.step1: I already like it. But can we make it even bigger? I am thinking four times as big.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_10.step2: What are we going to do with all this space?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_10.step3: I was thinking about a separate chamber for the pond of your dreams. In case you're willing to give it all up, the current size works.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_12.step1: I am so proud of us, guys. Time passes by but we are still the best at what we do.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_12.step2: Couldn’t agree more. Fantastic team effort and well-deserved success.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_12.step3: The question is, will Grizzly be able to penetrate the impenetrable fortress to get to his raspberry honey haven?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_9.step1: Look at this advanced fish tank I discovered! It seems to be equipped with some sort of robotic technology. And... there's a fish inside!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_9.step2: That be Cyber Fin! Someone must have captured her and trapped her in this tank!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_9.step3: With the items we've found, Alvin and I can design and assemble a new robotic tank for Cyber Fin to reside in when on land.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_9.step4: Gather everything we've found, and let's prepare to rescue Cyber Fin. Our journey has led us to this moment, and we must be ready for whatever comes our way.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_10.step1: Thanks to ye all, Cyber Fin is safe now! She can even voice her thoughts. I couldn't have done it without ye.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_10.step2: Thank you, my friends. I've been held captive for far too long.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_10.step3: Cyber Fin, what happened to you? How did you end up in that fish tank?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_10.step4: It's a long story, and there's more to it than you can imagine. A great danger lies ahead, and we must prepare for the storm that is coming...
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_10.step5: Then we shall face this danger together. For now, welcome to our team, Cyber Fin. Let's make the Mergest Kingdom even greater, and brace ourselves for the challenges that await us.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_10.step1: The Cosmic Voyager... this ship can withstand the harshest conditions of space travel.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_10.step2: And it is designed to cover immense distances. We are about to embark on a truly grand journey.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_10.step3: We've come this far, I can hardly believe what we're achieving.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_10.step4: And it all started with a handful of spare parts. The Universe is waiting, my friends!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step1: Behold, the Celestial Chariot! A machine built for the stars, a key to unlock our universe.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step2: Let's not rush into launching it. This chariot is a masterpiece of ancient technology, there might be more secrets to uncover.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step3: I agree with CyberFin. We must study this marvel first. It represents a grand step in our journey, but we must tread carefully
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step4: Indeed, who knows what other doors this chariot might open for us? The Universe is vast, my friends. Let's prepare to embrace it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step5: Wait! There's something etched here in the ancient language... It says... 'Beware the...' The rest is obscured. I believe our journey is just beginning!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_11.step1: Look at this! It seems to be following the same geometric principles as our earlier findings, but it's clearly more intricate. Is it me, or does this look like a key?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_11.step2: A key? I can sense a strong power coming from it. Maybe it's not just a key but a 'bridge'... A bridge to another realm?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_11.step3: Whatever it is, it's beautiful! Makes me want to write a love ballad about it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_11.step4: Careful, we still don't know what we're dealing with here. Let's not make hasty assumptions.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_11.step5: Indeed, CyberFin. But we are closer to understanding than we have ever been before. Let's not waver in our resolve now!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_11.step6: Right you are, my King! To the final piece of the puzzle!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_13.step1: Incredible! This... This is unlike anything we've ever seen before. It's... a lunar platform?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_13.step2: By all the laws of science, this should not be possible, yet here it is, floating right before our eyes. We have much to learn from this.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_13.step3: The Moon Stones, they are arranged in some kind of pattern. Do you see it? Could this be the 'bridge' the Enchantress spoke of?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_13.step4: I feel a surge of magic like nothing else. This platform... it's not just made of moonstones. It's a celestial gateway!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_13.step5: Could this be the final step to fully awakening the Celestial Carriage?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.moonstone_13.step6: Only one way to find out!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step1: This suit... It's ancient, but in excellent condition. Woven with armoured thread, too. She must have been a warrior of some kind.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step2: Yes, and more than that. Legend has it, Luna Bamboo was born under a glowing bamboo shoot in the heart of the forest. Anointed by the spirits, she was deemed their protector. Every item we found was touched by her divine grace.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step3: Born under a glowing bamboo shoot? Divine grace? These sound like fairy tales, CyberFin.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step4: Fairy tales often carry the seeds of truth, Grizzly. Our world is full of mystery and wonder.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step5: Well, whether it's a fairy tale or not, I must say... I'm intrigued to meet this Luna Bamboo.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_10.step1: Well, here she is... The legendary Luna Bamboo.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_10.step2: It's been a while since anyone sought me out. I welcome you, brave seekers. You must have traveled far.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_10.step5: Yes, Luna Bamboo, we have come seeking your wisdom. We need your help in unraveling a mystery of CyberFin's capture. We hope you could guide us.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_10.step6: A quest, then? Very well. Let's see what wisdom I can offer.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.thanksgiving_0.step1: Look at this! It is a new item! But how did it appear and what to do with it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.thanksgiving_0.step2: This is a Thanksgiving item. Merge any objects from level two and above to receive Thanksgiving items, and when you collect all of them, you'll get a new unique landmark! Hurry up, time is limited!

xmas_json.moneyFogXmas1.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and start your winter archipelago collection! Remember, little pigeons can carry great messages!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas2.name: Starland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas2.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! Help the king find his one true love by taking advantage of extra resources!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas3.name: Merryland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas3.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! Set your foot on the most desirable island of all and make the Christmas unforgettable!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas4.name: Sparkland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas4.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! Magic stars and other incredible pieces are your’s for the taking!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas5.name: Workland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas5.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! Make sure that everything is done in time for Christmas with an army of the fastest workers in the whole wide world!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas6.name: Multiland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas6.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! Continue your journey of discovery without making any compromises!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas7.name: Mapleland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas7.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! Local maples are known to be the most resourceful trees of the realm and you can have them all!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas8.name: Chestland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas8.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! Surprise yourself by collecting the most valuable and unexpected items!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas9.name: Snowland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas9.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! There is no such thing as too much snow when it comes to celebrating Christmas and there is no place better to find it!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas10.name: Wonderland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas10.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and crown your winter archipelago collection! Complete this jolly journey in the most exciting way possible by gifting yourself this festive island!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas11.name: Giftland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas11.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! This holiday season spreads mirth and jolliness all over the Kingdom and it’s your chance to get the most out of it!
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas12.name: Forestland
xmas_json.moneyFogXmas12.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! Chop your way through the most festive trees the Kingdom has ever seen and fill the island with even more toys!
xmas_json.factory2FogXmas.name: Toysland
xmas_json.factory2FogXmas.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of Christmas land and replenish your winter archipelago collection! Get the most out of Christmas by owning your own toy factory and bringing joy and happiness to the ones around you!

xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1a_0.step1: Are we sure that this is a Christmas Island? I expected a chorus of carols and the sparkle of festive lights, not this hush.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1a_0.step2: Yes, it's peculiar. The usual joy of the season is missing, replaced by a stillness as if the island is holding its breath.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1a_0.step3: What brings us here, then? We're wanderers of lands far and wide, but this silence... It's a riddle wrapped in tinsel.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1a_0.step4: Maybe that's our purpose — to unwrap the mystery of this quiet. To relight the yuletide glow that's been dimmed.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1a_0.step5: Let's seek out someone who knows these lands. If Christmas cheer has faded, we'll rekindle it. After all, every frosty path leads to a warm hearth.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer0a_0.step1: Greetings, friend! We're strangers to this island and seek to understand its muted cheer.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer0a_0.step2: Welcome, travelers. I've awaited your arrival. Christmas Island's joy has been locked away, and we need your aid to release it. Awake the toy factory we must.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer0a_0.step3: We're here to help. What's the first step to reviving the factory and the cheer?
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer0a_0.step4: Patience, for now, just finding the factory through the frost is where your quest begins...
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer2a_0.step1: Well done on crafting the toys. Now, take these Christmas bells. Their chimes are imbued with the power to revive the Christmas workshop.

xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer2a_0.step4: To the workshop, then. We'll bring the sound of joy and the spirit of Christmas back to every corner of this island.

xmas_unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcustomermain4_0.step1: Look, Santa's Sleigh! It used to soar the skies of Christmas Island, a dazzling spectacle of joy.

xmas_unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmproducer2b_0.step4: With the ovens lit, the aroma of Christmas treats will soon fill the air, another step towards restoring the island's cheer.

xmas_unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmproduct2a_0.step2: Absolutely. Let's head to the Christmas sights. Each wreath we place will help lift the gloom and restore the festive spirit.
xmas_unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmproduct2a_0.step3: The transformation starts now. This wreath is the first step in reviving the joy of Christmas Island.

xmas_unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmproducer2a_0.step2: As we prepare to spread this magic, I can't help but wonder, what cast such a shadow over Christmas Island?

xmas_unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmproducer2a_0.step4: A spell? Then our task is not just to decorate, but to break this curse. Each wreath we place is a strike against this gloomy enchantment.
xmas_unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmproducer2a_0.step5: Exactly. We'll light up the island, wreath by wreath, breaking the spell and bringing back the true spirit of Christmas.
